trans-unit.source: The min() function takes one or more comma separated expressions as its parameter, with the smallest (most negative) expression value result used as the value. The expresstions can be math functions (see calc() for more information), literal values, or other expressions, such as attr(), that evaluate to a valid argument type (like <length>). You can use different units for each value in your expression, if you wish. You may also use parentheses to establish computation order when needed.
trans-unit.target: 的 min() 函数采用一个或多个以逗号分隔的表达式作为它的参数，具有最小（最负）的表达值作为值的结果。表达式可以是数学函数（有关更多信息，请参见 calc() ），文字值或其他表达式，例如 attr() ，其结果为有效的参数类型（如 <length> ）。如果需要，可以为表达式中的每个值使用不同的单位。您还可以在需要时使用括号来建立计算顺序。

trans-unit.source: The min() function takes one or more comma-separated expressions as its parameter, with the smallest (most negative) expression value result used as the value.
trans-unit.target: 的 min() 函数采用一个或多个以逗号分隔的表达式作为它的参数，具有最小（最负）的表达值作为值的结果。

trans-unit.source: The min()CSS function lets you set the smallest (most negative) value from a list of comma-separated expressions as the value of a CSS property value. The min() function can be used anywhere a <length>, <frequency>, <angle>, <time>, <percentage>,<number>, or <integer> is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 使用 min() CSS函数，可以将逗号分隔的表达式列表中的最小（最负数）值设置为CSS属性值的值。的 min() 函数可以在任何地方使用的 <length> ， <frequency> ， <angle> ， <time> ， <percentage> ， <number> 或 <integer> 是允许的。

trans-unit.source: The min()CSSfunction lets you set the smallest (most negative) value from a list of comma-separated expressions as the value of a CSS property value. The min() function can be used anywhere a <length>, <frequency>, <angle>, <time>, <percentage>, <number>, or <integer> is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 使用 min() CSS函数，可以将逗号分隔的表达式列表中的最小（最负数）值设置为CSS属性值的值。的 min() 函数可以在任何地方使用的 <length> ， <frequency> ， <angle> ， <time> ， <percentage> ， <number> 或 <integer> 是允许的。

trans-unit.source: The min-block-size property takes the same values as the min-width and min-height properties.
trans-unit.target: 所述 min-block-size 属性取作为相同的值 min-width 和 min-height 特性。

trans-unit.source: The min-block-sizeCSS property defines the minimum horizontal or vertical size of an element's block, depending on its writing mode. It corresponds to either the min-width or the min-height property, depending on the value of writing-mode.
trans-unit.target: 所述 min-block-size CSS属性定义一个元素的块的最小水平或垂直尺寸，这取决于它的写入模式。它对应于 min-width 或 min-height 属性，具体取决于 writing-mode 的值。

trans-unit.source: The min-content sizing keyword represents the intrinsic minimum width of the content. For text content this means that the content will take all soft-wrapping opportunities, becoming as small as the longest word.
trans-unit.target: 该 min-content 上浆关键字表示内容的固有最小宽度。对于文本内容，这意味着内容将利用所有软包装的机会，变得与最长的单词一样小。

trans-unit.source: The min-heightCSS property sets the minimum height of an element. It prevents the used value of the height property from becoming smaller than the value specified for min-height.
trans-unit.target: 的 min-height CSS属性设置元素的最小高度。这样可以防止使用的 height 属性值变得小于为 min-height 指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The min-inline-size property takes the same values as the min-width and min-height properties.
trans-unit.target: 的 min-inline-size 属性取作为相同的值 min-width 和 min-height 特性。

trans-unit.source: The min-inline-sizeCSS property defines the horizontal or vertical minimal size of an element's block, depending on its writing mode. It corresponds to either the min-width or the min-height property, depending on the value of writing-mode.
trans-unit.target: 的 min-inline-size CSS属性定义一个元素的块的水平或垂直最小尺寸，这取决于它的写入模式。它对应于 min-width 或 min-height 属性，具体取决于 writing-mode 的值。

trans-unit.source: The min-width CSS descriptor specifies the minimum width of the viewport of a document defined via @viewport.
trans-unit.target: 的 min-width CSS描述符指定通过所定义的文档的视口的最小宽度 @viewport 。

trans-unit.source: The min-widthCSS property sets the minimum width of an element. It prevents the used value of the width property from becoming smaller than the value specified for min-width.
trans-unit.target: 的 min-width CSS属性设置元素的最小宽度。这样可以防止使用的 width 属性值变得小于为 min-width 指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The min-widthCSS property sets the minimum width of an element. It prevents the used value of the width property from becoming smaller than the value specified for min-width.
trans-unit.target: 的 min-width CSS属性设置元素的最小宽度。这样可以防止使用的 width 属性值变得小于为 min-width 指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The min-zoomCSS descriptor sets the minimum zoom factor of a document defined by the @viewportat-rule. The browser will not zoom out any further than this, whether automatically or at the user's request.
trans-unit.target: 的 min-zoom CSS描述符设置由定义文档的最小缩放因子 @viewport 在规则。浏览器将自动或根据用户的要求进行进一步缩小。

trans-unit.source: The minmax()CSSfunction defines a size range greater than or equal to min and less than or equal to max. It is used with CSS Grids.
trans-unit.target: 在 minmax() CSS功能限定的尺寸范围大于或等于 min 和小于或等于 max 。它与CSS网格一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The mix-blend-modeCSS property sets how an element's content should blend with the content of the element's parent and the element's background.
trans-unit.target: 该 mix-blend-mode CSS属性设置如何元素的内容应与元素的父的内容和元素的背景融为一体。

trans-unit.source: The monochrome feature is specified as an <integer> representing the number of bits per pixel in the monochrome frame buffer. If the device is not a monochrome device, the value is zero. It is a range feature, meaning that you can also use the prefixed min-monochrome and max-monochrome variants to query minimum and maximum values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 的 monochrome 特征被指定为 <integer> 表示每个像素的位数中的单色帧缓冲器的数量。如果该设备不是单色设备，则该值为零。这是一个范围功能，这意味着您还可以使用带前缀的 min-monochrome 和 max-monochrome 变体分别查询最小值和最大值。

trans-unit.source: The monochromeCSSmedia feature can be used to test the number of bits per pixel in the monochrome frame buffer of the output device.
trans-unit.target: 的 monochrome CSS 媒体功能可用于测试在输出装置的单色帧缓冲器每像素的比特数。

If present in a comma-separated list of queries, it will only negate the specific query to which it is applied. If you use the not operator, you must also specify a media type.

trans-unit.source: The object-fitCSS property sets how the content of a replaced element, such as an <img> or <video>, should be resized to fit its container.
trans-unit.target: 的 object-fit CSS属性集如何一个的内容替换元件，如 <img> 或 <video> ，应调整大小以适应其容器。

trans-unit.source: The object-positionCSS property specifies the alignment of the selected replaced element's contents within the element's box. Areas of the box which aren't covered by the replaced element's object will show the element's background.
trans-unit.target: 的 object-position 的CSS属性指定所选择的对准替换元件的元件的盒子内的内容。框的未被替换元素的对象覆盖的区域将显示元素的背景。

trans-unit.source: The offset-anchorCSS property specifies the point inside the box of an element travelling along an offset-path that is actually moving along the path.

trans-unit.source: The offset-pathCSS property specifies a motion path for an element to follow and defines the element's positioning within the parent container or SVG coordinate system.

trans-unit.source: The offset-rotate CSS property defines the orientation/direction of the element as it is positioned along the offset-path.

trans-unit.source: The offset CSS shorthand property sets all the properties required for animating an element along a defined path.

trans-unit.source: The offset CSS property is a shorthand property for animating an element along a defined path.

trans-unit.source: The only keyword prevents older browsers that do not support media queries with media features from applying the given styles. It has no effect on modern browsers.
trans-unit.target: 该 only 关键字，可避免旧的浏览器不支持与媒体功能媒体查询从应用给定的风格。它对现代浏览器没有影响。

trans-unit.source: The only operator is used to apply a style only if an entire query matches, and is useful for preventing older browsers from applying selected styles. If you use the only operator, you must also specify a media type.
trans-unit.target: 该 only 操作仅用如果整个查询匹配应用样式，并且是防止旧的浏览器应用从选定的样式很有用。如果使用 only 运算符，则还必须指定媒体类型。

trans-unit.source: The only operator is used to apply a style only if an entire query matches, and is useful for preventing older browsers from applying selected styles. When not using only, older browsers would interpret the query screen and (max-width: 500px) simply as screen, ignoring the remainder of the query, and applying its styles on all screens. If you use the only operator, you must also specify a media type.
trans-unit.target: 该 only 操作仅用如果整个查询匹配应用样式，并且是防止旧的浏览器应用从选定的样式很有用。当不使用 only ，旧的浏览器将其解释查询 screen and (max-width: 500px) 仅仅作为 screen ，忽视了查询的剩余部分，并在所有屏幕上应用其样式。如果使用 only 运算符，则还必须指定媒体类型。

trans-unit.source: The opacity()CSS function applies transparency to the samples in the input image. Its result is a <filter-function>.
trans-unit.target: 的 opacity() CSS功能适用透明度的输入图像中的样本。其结果是 <filter-function> 。

trans-unit.source: The opacity()CSSfunction applies transparency to the samples in the input image. Its result is a <filter-function>.

trans-unit.source: The opacity CSS property sets the opacity of an element. Opacity is the degree to which content behind an element is hidden, and is the opposite of transparency.
trans-unit.target: 在 opacity 的CSS属性设置元素的透明度。不透明度是元素后面的内容被隐藏的程度，与透明度相反。

trans-unit.source: The opacity CSS property sets the transparency of an element or the degree to which content behind an element is visible.
trans-unit.target: 在 opacity 的CSS属性设置元素的透明度或到一个元素后面的内容是可见的程度。

trans-unit.source: The open-quote and close-quote values of the content property produce no quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 在 open-quote 和 close-quote 中的价值 content 财产不产生引号。

trans-unit.source: The optimizeSpeed option has no effect on Firefox 4 because the standard code for text rendering is already fast and there is not a faster code path at this time. See bug 595688 for details.
trans-unit.target: 该 optimizeSpeed 选项对火狐4没有影响，因为对于文本渲染标准的代码已经快并没有在这个时候更快的代码路径。有关详细信息，请参见错误595688。

trans-unit.source: The order property
trans-unit.target: 该 order 属性

trans-unit.source: The order property is designed to lay the items out in ordinal groups. What this means is that items are assigned an integer that represents their group. The items are then placed in the visual order according to that integer, lowest values first. If more than one item has the same integer value, then within that group the items are laid out as per source order.
trans-unit.target: 该 order 属性的设计奠定了项目列于序组。这意味着为项目分配了代表其组的整数。然后，根据该整数以最低的值将这些项按视觉顺序放置。如果多个项目具有相同的整数值，则在该组中按源顺序对项目进行布局。

trans-unit.source: The orderCSS property sets the order to lay out an item in a flex or grid container. Items in a container are sorted by ascending order value and then by their source code order.
trans-unit.target: 该 order CSS属性设置为了在柔性或网格容器布置的项目。在容器中的数据项都按升序排序 order 可以通过源代码顺序值，然后。

trans-unit.source: The orientation CSS descriptor controls the orientation of a document defined by @viewport.
trans-unit.target: 该 orientation CSS 描述符控制由定义的文档的方向 @viewport 。

trans-unit.source: The orientation feature is specified as a keyword value chosen from the list below.
trans-unit.target: 的 orientation 特性被指定为从下面的列表中选择的关键字值。

trans-unit.source: The orientationCSSmedia feature can be used to test the orientation of the viewport (or the page box, for paged media).
trans-unit.target: 该 orientation CSS 媒体功能，可以用来测试的方向视（或页面中，为页面媒体）。

trans-unit.source: The orphans and widows properties take an integer as a value, which represents the number of lines to keep together at the end and start of a fragment, respectively. Note that these properties only work inside a block container, such as a paragraph. If the block has fewer lines in it than the number that you specify as a value, all lines will be kept together.
trans-unit.target: “ orphans 和“ widows 属性采用整数作为值，该整数分别表示要在片段的结尾和开头保持在一起的行数。请注意，这些属性仅在块容器（例如段落）中起作用。如果块中的行数少于您指定为值的数目，则所有行将保持在一起。

trans-unit.source: The orphansCSS property sets the minimum number of lines in a block container that must be shown at the bottom of a page, region, or column.
trans-unit.target: 的 orphans CSS属性设置在一个块容器线必须在被显示的最小数目底部一个的页面，区域或柱。

trans-unit.source: The outline-color CSS property sets the color of an element's outline.

trans-unit.source: The overflow-anchorCSS property provides a way to opt out of the browser's scroll anchoring behavior, which adjusts scroll position to minimize content shifts.

trans-unit.source: The overflow-inlineCSS property sets what shows when content overflows the inline start and end edges of a box. This may be nothing, a scroll bar, or the overflow content.
trans-unit.target: 该 overflow-inline CSS属性设置当内容溢出什么节目一箱的直列开始和结束的边缘。可能什么也不是，可能没有滚动条或溢出内容。

trans-unit.source: The overflow-inlineCSSmedia feature can be used to test how the output device handles content that overflows the initial containing block along the inline axis.
trans-unit.target: 所述 overflow-inline CSS媒体功能可用于测试如何输出设备句柄的内容溢出的初始包含块沿字形轴。

trans-unit.source: The overflow-wrap property is specified as a single keyword chosen from the list of values below.
trans-unit.target: 将 overflow-wrap 属性指定为从下面的值列表中选择的单个关键字。

trans-unit.source: The overflow-x property is specified as a single keyword chosen from the list of values below.
trans-unit.target: 将 overflow-x 属性指定为从下面的值列表中选择的单个关键字。

trans-unit.source: The overflow-xCSS property sets what shows when content overflows a block-level element's left and right edges. This may be nothing, a scroll bar, or the overflow content.
trans-unit.target: 该 overflow-x CSS属性设置当内容溢出什么节目一个块级元素的左，右边缘。可能什么也不是，可能没有滚动条或溢出内容。

trans-unit.source: The overflow-y property is specified as a single keyword chosen from the list of values below.
trans-unit.target: 所述 overflow-y 属性指定为从下面的值的列表中选择一个关键字。

trans-unit.source: The overflow-yCSS property sets what shows when content overflows a block-level element's top and bottom edges. This may be nothing, a scroll bar, or the overflow content.
trans-unit.target: 当对象内容溢出块级元素的顶部和底部边缘时， overflow-y CSS属性设置显示内容。可能没有任何内容，滚动条或溢出内容。

trans-unit.source: The overflow property is specified as one or two keywords chosen from the list of values below. If two keywords are specified, the first applies to overflow-x and the second to overflow-y. Otherwise, both overflow-x and overflow-y are set to the same value.
trans-unit.target: 将 overflow 属性指定为从下面的值列表中选择的一个或两个关键字。如果指定了两个关键字，则第一个应用于 overflow-x ，第二个应用于 overflow-y 。否则，将 overflow-x 和 overflow-y 设置为相同的值。

trans-unit.source: The overflowCSS property sets what to do when an element's content is too big to fit in its block formatting context. It is a shorthand for overflow-x and overflow-y.
trans-unit.target: CSS的 overflow 属性设置当元素的内容太大而无法容纳其块格式上下文时该怎么做。这是一个简写为 overflow-x 和 overflow-y 。

trans-unit.source: The overflowCSSshorthand property sets the desired behavior for an element's overflow — i.e. when an element's content is too big to fit in its block formatting context — in both directions.
trans-unit.target: CSS的 overflow 速记属性在两个方向上为元素的溢出设置了所需的行为（即，当元素的内容太大而无法容纳其块格式上下文时）。

trans-unit.source: The overscroll-behavior-block CSS property sets the browser's behavior when the block direction boundary of a scrolling area is reached.
trans-unit.target: 在 overscroll-behavior-block 到达滚动区域的块方向边界时，CSS属性设置浏览器的行为。

trans-unit.target: 在 overscroll-behavior-inline 达到滚动区域的一字形方向的边界时，CSS属性设置浏览器的行为。

trans-unit.source: The overscroll-behavior-inline property is specified as a keyword chosen from the list of values below.
trans-unit.target: 在 overscroll-behavior-inline 属性被指定为从下面的值的列表中选择一个关键字。

trans-unit.source: The overscroll-behavior-x CSS property sets the browser's behavior when the horizontal boundary of a scrolling area is reached.
trans-unit.target: 在 overscroll-behavior-x 到达滚动区域的水平边界时，CSS属性设置浏览器的行为。

trans-unit.source: The overscroll-behavior-x property is specified as a keyword chosen from the list of values below.
trans-unit.target: 在 overscroll-behavior-x 属性指定为从下面的值的列表中选择一个关键字。

trans-unit.source: The overscroll-behavior-y CSS property sets the browser's behavior when the vertical boundary of a scrolling area is reached.
trans-unit.target: 在 overscroll-behavior-y 达到滚动区域的垂直边界时，CSS属性设置浏览器的行为。

trans-unit.source: The overscroll-behavior-y property is specified as a keyword chosen from the list of values below.
trans-unit.target: 在 overscroll-behavior-y 特性被指定为从下面的值的列表中选择一个关键字。

trans-unit.source: The overscroll-behavior CSS property sets what a browser does when reaching the boundary of a scrolling area. It's a shorthand for overscroll-behavior-x and overscroll-behavior-y.
trans-unit.target: 在 overscroll-behavior CSS属性设置到达滚动区域的边界时，浏览器做什么。这是 overscroll-behavior-x 和 overscroll-behavior-y 的简写。

trans-unit.source: The overscroll-behavior property is specified as one or two keywords chosen from the list of values below.
trans-unit.target: 在 overscroll-behavior 属性指定为从下面的值的列表中选择一个或两个关键字。

trans-unit.source: The pad descriptor can be used with custom counter style definitions when you need the marker representations to have a minimum length.
trans-unit.target: 当您需要标记表示具有最小长度时， pad 描述符可与自定义计数器样式定义一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The pad descriptor can be used with custom counter style definitions when you need the marker representations to have a minimum length. If a marker representation is smaller than the specified pad length, then the marker will be padded with the specified pad symbol. Marker representations longer than the pad length are constructed as normal. Pad descriptor takes the minimum marker length as an integer and a symbol to be used for padding as the second parameter. A common usage of the pad descriptor is when you need your list to start numbering from 01 and go through 02, 03 and so on, instead of just 1, 2, 3...
trans-unit.target: 当您需要标记表示具有最小长度时， pad 描述符可以与自定义计数器样式定义一起使用。如果标记表示形式小于指定的填充长度，则将使用指定的填充符号填充标记。长于焊盘长度的标记表示将正常构建。填充描述符将最小标记长度作为整数，并将要用于填充的符号作为第二参数。填充描述符的一种常见用法是当您需要列表从01开始编号并经过02、03等等时，而不是仅1，2，3 ...

trans-unit.source: The padding-block-end property takes the same values as the padding-left property.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding-block-end 属性采用相同的值作为 padding-left 属性。

trans-unit.source: The padding-block-endCSS property defines the logical block end padding of an element, which maps to a physical padding depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding-block-end CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到取决于元件的写入模式，方向性，和文本方向的物理填充的逻辑块端填充。

trans-unit.source: The padding-block-endCSS property defines the logical block end padding of an element, which maps to a physical padding depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the padding-top, padding-right, padding-bottom, or padding-left property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding-block-end CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到取决于元件的写入模式，方向性，和文本方向的物理填充的逻辑块端填充。它对应于 padding-top ， padding-right ， padding-bottom 或 padding-left 属性，具体取决于为 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 定义的值。

trans-unit.source: The padding-block-start property takes the same values as the padding-left property.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding-block-start 属性采用相同的值作为 padding-left 属性。

trans-unit.source: The padding-block-startCSS property defines the logical block start padding of an element, which maps to a physical padding depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding-block-start CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到取决于元件的写入模式，方向性，和文本方向的物理填充的逻辑块开始填充。

trans-unit.source: The padding-block-startCSS property defines the logical block start padding of an element, which maps to a physical padding depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the padding-top, padding-right, padding-bottom, or padding-left property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding-block-start CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到取决于元件的写入模式，方向性，和文本方向的物理填充的逻辑块开始填充。它对应于 padding-top ， padding-right ， padding-bottom 或 padding-left 属性，具体取决于为 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 定义的值。

trans-unit.source: The padding-block property takes the same values as the padding-left property.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding-block 属性采用相同的值作为 padding-left 属性。

trans-unit.source: The padding-blockCSS property defines the logical block start and end padding of an element, which maps to physical padding properties depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding-block CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到取决于元件的写入模式，方向性，和文本方向物理padding属性的逻辑块的开始和结束填充。

trans-unit.source: The padding-blockCSSshorthand property defines the logical block start and end padding of an element, which maps to physical padding properties depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding-block CSS简写属性定义了一个元素，其映射到取决于元件的写入模式，方向性，和文本方向物理padding属性的逻辑块的开始和结束填充。

trans-unit.source: The padding-bottom property is specified as a single value chosen from the list below. Unlike margins, negative values are not allowed for padding.
trans-unit.target: 所述 padding-bottom 属性指定为从下面的列表中选择的一个值。与边距不同，填充时不允许使用负值。

trans-unit.source: The padding-bottomCSS property sets the height of the padding area on the bottom of an element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 padding-bottom CSS属性设置的高度填补区域上的元件的底部。

trans-unit.source: The padding-bottomCSS property sets the height of the padding area on the bottom of an element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 padding-bottom CSS属性设置的高度填补区域上的元件的底部。

trans-unit.source: The padding-box value defines the shape enclosed by the outside padding edge. This shape follows all of the normal border radius shaping rules for the inside of the border. If you have no padding then padding-box is the same as content-box.
trans-unit.target: 的 padding-box 值定义了外部填充边缘所包围的形状。此形状遵循边界内部所有正常的边界半径成形规则。如果没有填充，则 padding-box 与 content-box 相同。

trans-unit.source: The padding-inline-end property takes the same values as the padding-left property.
trans-unit.target: 所述 padding-inline-end 属性采用相同的值作为 padding-left 属性。

trans-unit.source: The padding-inline-endCSS property defines the logical inline end padding of an element, which maps to a physical padding depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation.
trans-unit.target: 所述 padding-inline-end CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到取决于元件的写入模式，方向性，和文本方向的物理填充的逻辑直列端填充。

trans-unit.source: The padding-inline-endCSS property defines the logical inline end padding of an element, which maps to a physical padding depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the padding-top, padding-right, padding-bottom, or padding-left property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.
trans-unit.target: 所述 padding-inline-end CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到取决于元件的写入模式，方向性，和文本方向的物理填充的逻辑直列端填充。它对应于 padding-top ， padding-right ， padding-bottom 或 padding-left 属性，具体取决于为 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 定义的值。

trans-unit.source: The padding-inline-start property takes the same values as the padding-left property.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding-inline-start 属性采用相同的值 padding-left 财产。

trans-unit.source: The padding-inline-startCSS property defines the logical inline start padding of an element, which maps to a physical padding depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding-inline-start CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到依赖于要素的写作模式，方向性和文本方向的物理填充的逻辑直列开始填充。

trans-unit.source: The padding-inline property takes the same values as the padding-left property.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding-inline 属性采用相同的值 padding-left 财产。

trans-unit.source: The padding-inlineCSS property defines the logical inline start and end padding of an element, which maps to physical padding properties depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation.
trans-unit.target: 的 padding-inline CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到取决于元件的写入模式，方向性，和文本方向物理padding属性的逻辑内联的开始和结束填充。

trans-unit.target: 的 padding-inline CSS简写属性定义了一个元素，其映射到取决于元件的写入模式，方向性，和文本方向物理padding属性的逻辑内联的开始和结束填充。

trans-unit.source: The padding-left property is specified as a single value chosen from the list below. Unlike margins, negative values are not allowed for padding.
trans-unit.target: 所述 padding-left 属性被指定为从下面的列表中选择的一个值。与边距不同，填充时不允许使用负值。

trans-unit.source: The padding-leftCSS property sets the width of the padding area to the left of an element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 padding-left CSS属性设置的宽度填补区域的元素的左侧。

trans-unit.source: The padding-leftCSS property sets the width of the padding area on the left side of an element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 padding-left CSS属性设置的宽度填补区域上的元素的左侧。

trans-unit.source: The padding-right property is specified as a single value chosen from the list below. Unlike margins, negative values are not allowed for padding.
trans-unit.target: 所述 padding-right 属性被指定为从下面的列表中选择的一个值。与边距不同，填充时不允许使用负值。

trans-unit.source: The padding-rightCSS property sets the width of the padding area on the right of an element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 padding-right CSS属性设置的宽度填补区域上的元件的右侧。

trans-unit.source: The padding-top property is specified as a single value chosen from the list below. Unlike margins, negative values are not allowed for padding.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding-top 属性指定为从下面的列表中选择的一个值。与边距不同，填充时不允许使用负值。

trans-unit.source: The padding-topCSS property sets the height of the padding area on the top of an element.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding-top CSS属性设置的高度填补区域上的元件的顶部。

trans-unit.source: The padding-topCSS property sets the height of the padding area on the top of an element.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding-top CSS属性设置的高度填补区域上的元件的顶部。

trans-unit.source: The padding property may be specified using one, two, three, or four values. Each value is a <length> or a <percentage>. Negative values are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 的 padding 属性可以使用一个，两个，三个，或四个值来指定。每个值都是 <length> 或 <percentage> 。负值无效。

trans-unit.source: The padding property may be specified using one, two, three, or four values. Each value is a <length> or a <percentage>. Negative values are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 的 padding 属性可以使用一个，两个，三个，或四个值来指定。每个值都是 <length> 或 <percentage> 。负值无效。

trans-unit.source: The padding shorthand property sets paddings on all four sides of an element: padding-top, padding-right, padding-bottom, and padding-left.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding ：在元素的四面速记属性设置垫衬 padding-top ， padding-right ， padding-bottom ，并 padding-left 。

trans-unit.source: The paddingCSSshorthand property sets the padding area on all four sides of an element at once.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding CSS速记属性设置填充区域同时对元素的所有四个侧面。

trans-unit.source: The paddingCSS property sets the padding area on all four sides of an element. It is a shorthand for padding-top, padding-right, padding-bottom, and padding-left.
trans-unit.target: 该 padding CSS属性设置填充区域上的元素的所有四个侧面。这是一个简写为 padding-top ， padding-right ， padding-bottom ，并 padding-left 。

trans-unit.source: The page-break-after CSS property adjusts page breaks after the current element.
trans-unit.target: 该 page-break-after 的CSS属性调整分页符后的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: The page-break-after property is now a legacy property, replaced by break-after.
trans-unit.target: 该 page-break-after ，如今是一家传统的财产，取而代之的是 break-after 。

trans-unit.source: The page-break-before CSS property adjusts page breaks before the current element.
trans-unit.target: CSS 的 page-break-before 属性调整当前元素之前的分页符。

trans-unit.source: The page-break-before property is now a legacy property, replaced by break-before.
trans-unit.target: 该 page-break-before ，如今是一家传统的财产，取而代之的是 break-before 。

trans-unit.source: The page-break-inside CSS property adjusts page breaks inside the current element.
trans-unit.target: 该 page-break-inside CSS属性调整分页符内当前元素。

trans-unit.source: The page-break-inside property is now a legacy property, replaced by break-inside.
trans-unit.target: 该 page-break-inside ，如今是一家传统的财产，取而代之的是 break-inside 。

trans-unit.source: The paint()CSSfunction defines an <image> value generated with a PaintWorklet.
trans-unit.target: 的 paint() CSS功能定义 <image> 与PaintWorklet生成的值。

trans-unit.source: The paint-orderCSS property lets you control the order in which the fill and stroke (and painting markers) of text content and shapes are drawn.
trans-unit.target: 该 paint-order CSS属性可以让你控制其中的填充和文本内容和形状行程（和绘画标记）绘制的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The perspective() transform function is part of the transform value applied on the element being transformed. This differs from the perspective and perspective-origin properties which are attached to the parent of a child transformed in 3-dimensional space.
trans-unit.target: 的 perspective() 变换函数是的一部分 transform 施加在元件被转化值。这与附加到3维空间中转换后的孩子的父母的 perspective 和 perspective-origin 属性不同。

trans-unit.source: The perspective()CSS function defines a transformation that sets the distance between the user and the z=0 plane. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 的 perspective() CSS功能定义了设置用户和在z = 0平面之间的距离的变换。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The perspective()CSSfunction defines a transformation that sets the distance between the user and the z=0 plane, the perspective from which the viewer would be if the 2-dimensional interface were 3-dimensional. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 的 perspective() CSS功能定义了设置在用户和z = 0的平面之间的距离的变换，透视从观看者是，如果2维接口分别为3维的。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The perspective-originCSS property determines the position at which the viewer is looking. It is used as the vanishing point by the perspective property.
trans-unit.target: 该 perspective-origin CSS属性决定了观众期待的位置。它被用作灭点由 perspective 属性。

trans-unit.source: The perspective-originand perspective properties are attached to the parent of a child transformed in 3-dimensional space, unlike the perspective() transform function which is placed on the element being transformed.
trans-unit.target: 的 perspective-origin 和 perspective 性附接至在3维空间中转化的孩子，不像的父 perspective() 变换其被放置在所述元件被转化功能。

trans-unit.source: The perspectiveCSS property determines the distance between the z=0 plane and the user in order to give a 3D-positioned element some perspective.
trans-unit.target: 的 perspective CSS属性确定为了得到三维定位的元素一些透视在z = 0平面和用户之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: The perspectiveCSS property determines the distance between the z=0 plane and the user in order to give a 3D-positioned element some perspective. Each 3D element with z>0 becomes larger; each 3D-element with z<0 becomes smaller. The strength of the effect is determined by the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 的 perspective CSS属性确定为了得到三维定位的元素一些透视在z = 0平面和用户之间的距离。z> 0的每个3D元素都会变大；z <0的每个3D元素都会变小。效果的强度取决于此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The place-selfCSS property is a shorthand property sets both the align-self and justify-self properties. The first value is the align-self property value, the second the justify-self one. If the second value is not present, the first value is also used for it.
trans-unit.target: 在 place-self CSS属性是一个速记属性同时设置 align-self 和 justify-self 的属性。第一个值是 align-self 属性值，第二个是 justify-self 属性值。如果不存在第二个值，则也使用第一个值。

trans-unit.source: The place-selfCSSshorthand property allows you to align an individual item in both the block and inline directions at once (i.e. the align-self and justify-self properties) in a relevant layout system such as Grid or Flexbox. If the second value is not present, the first value is also used for it.
trans-unit.target: 在 place-self CSS速记属性可以让你在这两个区块和内联方向同时对准个别项目（即 align-self 和 justify-self 的属性）在相关布局系统，如电网或Flexbox的。如果不存在第二个值，则也使用第一个值。

trans-unit.source: The pointer-events property is specified as a single keyword chosen from the list of values below.
trans-unit.target: 的 pointer-events 属性指定为从下面的值的列表中选择一个关键字。

trans-unit.source: The pointer-eventsCSS property sets under what circumstances (if any) a particular graphic element can become the target of pointer events.
trans-unit.target: 该 pointer-events CSS属性设置在什么情况下（如果有的话）一个特定的图形元素都可以成为目标指针的事件。

trans-unit.source: The pointer-eventsCSS property sets under what circumstances (if any) a particular graphic element can become the target of mouse events.
trans-unit.target: 该 pointer-events CSS属性设置在什么情况下（如果有的话）一个特定的图形元素都可以成为目标鼠标事件。

trans-unit.source: The pointer feature is specified as a keyword value chosen from the list below.
trans-unit.target: 所述 pointer 的功能被指定为从下面的列表中选择的关键字值。

trans-unit.source: The pointer media feature
trans-unit.target: 该 pointer 媒体功能

trans-unit.source: The pointerCSSmedia feature tests whether the user has a pointing device (such as a mouse), and if so, how accurate the primary pointing device is.
trans-unit.target: 该 pointer CSS 媒体特征测试用户是否具有指示设备（如鼠标），以及如果是，如何准确的主指点设备是。

trans-unit.source: The position property is specified as a single keyword chosen from the list of values below.

trans-unit.source: The positionCSS property sets how an element is positioned in a document. The top, right, bottom, and left properties determine the final location of positioned elements.

trans-unit.source: The prefers-color-schemeCSSmedia feature is used to detect if the user has requested the system use a light or dark color theme.

trans-unit.source: The prefers-reduced-dataCSSmedia feature is used to detect if the user has requested the web content that consumes less internet traffic.

trans-unit.source: The prefers-reduced-motionCSSmedia feature is used to detect if the user has requested that the system minimize the amount of animation or motion it uses.

trans-unit.source: The prefers-reduced-transparencyCSSmedia feature is used to detect if the user has requested that the system minimize the amount of transparency used across elements.

trans-unit.source: The radial-gradient()CSS function creates an image consisting of a progressive transition between two or more colors that radiate from an origin. Its shape may be a circle or an ellipse. The function's result is an object of the <gradient> data type, which is a special kind of <image>.
trans-unit.target: 的 radial-gradient() CSS函数创建了由该从原点辐射两种或多种颜色之间的渐进转换的图像。它的形状可以是圆形或椭圆形。函数的结果是 <gradient> 数据类型的对象，这是 <image> 的一种特殊类型。

trans-unit.source: The radial-gradient()CSSfunction creates an image consisting of a progressive transition between two or more colors that radiate from an origin. Its shape may be a circle or an ellipse. The function's result is an object of the <gradient> data type, which is a special kind of <image>.

trans-unit.source: The repeating-conic-gradient()CSSfunction creates an image consisting of a repeating gradient (rather than a single gradient) with color transitions rotated around a center point (rather than radiating from the center).
trans-unit.target: 的 repeating-conic-gradient() CSS功能创建由重复梯度（而非的图像 single gradient ）与颜色过渡旋转围绕中心点（而不是 radiating from the center ）。

trans-unit.source: The repeating-linear-gradient()CSS function creates an image consisting of repeating linear gradients. It is similar to linear-gradient() and takes the same arguments, but it repeats the color stops infinitely in all directions so as to cover its entire container. The function's result is an object of the <gradient> data type, which is a special kind of <image>.
trans-unit.target: 的 repeating-linear-gradient() CSS函数创建由重复的线性渐变的图像。它类似于 linear-gradient() 并采用相同的参数，但它会重复在所有方向上无限地停止颜色，以覆盖整个容器。函数的结果是 <gradient> 数据类型的对象，这是 <image> 的一种特殊类型。

trans-unit.source: The resolution feature is specified as a <resolution> value representing the pixel density of the output device. It is a range feature, meaning that you can also use the prefixed min-resolution and max-resolution variants to query minimum and maximum values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 的 resolution 特征被指定为 <resolution> 表示输出设备的像素密度值。这是一个范围功能，这意味着您还可以使用前缀的 min-resolution 和 max-resolution 变体分别查询最小值和最大值。

trans-unit.source: The revert CSS keyword rolls back the cascade so that a property takes on the value it would have had if there were no styles in the current style origin (author, user, or user-agent). Thus, it resets the property to the default value established by the user-agent stylesheet (or by user styles, if any exist). It can be applied to any CSS property, including the CSS shorthand all.
trans-unit.target: 该 revert CSS关键字回滚级联，这样的属性呈现，如果有在当前风格起源（作者，用户或用户代理）没有风格它本来还有价值。因此，它将属性重置为由用户代理样式表（或如果存在的话，由用户样式）建立的默认值。它可以应用于任何CSS属性，包括CSS速记 all 。

trans-unit.source: The revert CSS keyword reverts the cascaded value of the property from its current value to the value the property would have had if no changes had been made by the current style origin to the current element. Thus, it resets the property to its inherited value if it inherits from its parent or to the default value established by the user agent's stylesheet (or by user styles, if any exist). It can be applied to any CSS property, including the CSS shorthand all.
trans-unit.target: 如果CSS关键字 revert CSS关键字将属性的级联值从其当前值恢复为该属性应具有的值（如果当前样式原点未对当前元素进行任何更改）。因此，如果属性从其父项继承，则将属性重置为其继承的值，或者重置为由用户代理的样式表（或如果存在的话，由用户样式）建立的默认值。它可以应用于任何CSS属性，包括CSS速记 all 。

trans-unit.source: The revert keyword is different from and should not be confused with initial, which uses the initial value defined on a per-property basis by the CSS specifications. In contrast, user-agent stylesheets set default values on the basis of CSS selectors.
trans-unit.target: 该 revert 关键字是不同的，并且不应该与混淆 initial ，其使用初始值由CSS规范在每个属性基础上定义的。相反，用户代理样式表根据CSS选择器设置默认值。

trans-unit.source: The revert keyword is useful for isolating embedded widgets or components from the styles of the page that contains them, particularly when used with the all property.
trans-unit.target: 该 revert 关键字是从样式包含它们，与所使用的，特别是当页的隔离嵌入部件或组件有用的 all 财产。

trans-unit.source: The revert keyword works exactly the same as unset in many cases. The only difference is for properties that have values set by the browser or by custom stylesheets created by users (set on the browser side).
trans-unit.target: 在许多情况下， revert 关键字的工作原理与未 unset 关键字完全相同。唯一的区别是属性具有由浏览器或用户创建的自定义样式表（在浏览器侧设置）设置的值。

trans-unit.source: The rightCSS property participates in specifying the horizontal position of a positioned element. It has no effect on non-positioned elements.
trans-unit.target: 的 right CSS属性参与了指定的水平位置定位的元素。它对未定位的元素没有影响。

trans-unit.source: The rotate()CSS function defines a transformation that rotates an element around a fixed point on the 2D plane, without deforming it. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 的 rotate() CSS函数定义的变换其旋转围绕的2D平面上的固定点处的元件，而不会使其变形。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The rotate3d()CSS function defines a transformation that rotates an element around a fixed axis in 3D space, without deforming it. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.

trans-unit.source: The rotate3d()CSSfunction defines a transformation that rotates an element around a fixed axis in 3D space, without deforming it. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 所述 rotate3d() CSS函数定义的变换即绕在3D空间中的固定轴线的元件，而不使其变形。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The rotateCSS property allows you to specify rotation transforms individually and independantly of the transform property. This maps better to typical user interface usage, and saves having to remember the exact order of transform functions to specify in the transform value.
trans-unit.target: 该 rotate CSS属性可以单独和independantly的的指定旋转变换 transform 属性。这样可以更好地映射到典型的用户界面用法，并且省去了记住要在 transform 值中指定的转换函数的确切顺序的麻烦。

trans-unit.source: The safe-area-inset-* variables are four environment variables that define a rectangle by its top, right, bottom, and left insets from the edge of the viewport, which is safe to put content into without risking it being cut off by the shape of a non‑rectangular display. For rectangular viewports, like your average laptop monitor, their value is equal to zero. For non-rectangular displays — like a round watch face — the four values set by the user agent form a rectangle such that all content inside the rectangle is visible.
trans-unit.target: 该 safe-area-inset-* 变量是由它的上，右，下定义一个矩形的四个环境变量，从视口的边缘，这是安全的把内容分成，而不用担心它由被切断左插图非矩形显示器的形状。对于矩形视口，例如普通的笔记本电脑显示器，其值等于零。对于非矩形显示器（如圆形表盘），用户代理设置的四个值形成一个矩形，以便该矩形内的所有内容均可见。

trans-unit.source: The safe and unsafe keywords help define behaviour when an alignment subject is larger than the alignment container. The safe keyword will align to start in the case of a specified alignment causing an overflow, the aim being to avoid “data loss” where part of the item is outside of the boundaries of the alignment container and can’t be scrolled to.
trans-unit.target: 当对齐对象大于对齐容器时， safe 和 unsafe 关键字有助于定义行为。的 safe 关键字将对准 start 在指定的对齐的情况下，造成了上溢，其目的是避免“数据丢失”，其中的项目的部分是对准容器的边界之外，并且不能被滚动到。

trans-unit.source: The scanCSSmedia feature can be used to test the scanning process (if any) utilized by the output device. The word scanning used in this context does not refer to an image scanner, such as one used to digitize a photograph. Rather, it means the process by which an image is painted onto a television screen (or other device).
trans-unit.target: 该 scan CSS 媒体功能可用于测试扫描处理（如果有的话）通过输出装置使用。在本文中使用的单词扫描不涉及图像扫描仪，例如用于数字化照片的图像扫描仪。相反，它表示将图像绘制到电视屏幕（或其他设备）上的过程。

trans-unit.source: The scanCSSmedia feature can be used to test the scanning process (if any) utilized by the output device. The word scanning used in this context does not refer to an image scanner, such as one used to digitize a photograph. Rather, it means the process by which an image is painted onto a television screen (or other device).
trans-unit.target: 该 scan CSS媒体功能可用于测试扫描处理（如果有的话）通过输出装置使用。在此上下文中使用的单词扫描不涉及图像扫描仪，例如用于数字化照片的图像扫描仪。相反，它表示将图像绘制到电视屏幕（或其他设备）上的过程。

trans-unit.source: The scriptingCSSmedia feature can be used to test whether scripting (such as JavaScript) is available.

trans-unit.source: The scroll-behavior property is specified as one of the keyword values listed below.

trans-unit.source: The scroll-behaviorCSS property sets the behavior for a scrolling box when scrolling is triggered by the navigation or CSSOM scrolling APIs.
trans-unit.target: 当导航或CSSOM滚动API触发滚动时， scroll-behavior CSS属性设置滚动框的行为。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-behaviorCSS property specifies the scrolling behavior for a scrolling box when scrolling is triggered by one of the navigation or CSSOM scrolling APIs.
trans-unit.target: 当由导航或CSSOM滚动API之一触发滚动时， scroll-behavior CSS属性指定滚动框的滚动行为。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-margin-block-end property defines the margin of the scroll snap area at the end of the block dimension that is used for snapping this box to the snapport. The scroll snap area is determined by taking the transformed border box, finding its rectangular bounding box (axis-aligned in the scroll container’s coordinate space), then adding the specified outsets.
trans-unit.target: 该 scroll-margin-block-end 特性在其用于捕捉此方框，snapport块尺寸的端部限定的滚动卡扣区域的边缘。滚动捕捉区域的确定方法是：获取变形的边框，找到其矩形边界框（在滚动容器的坐标空间中轴向对齐），然后添加指定的起点。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-margin-block-start property defines the margin of the scroll snap area at the start of the block dimension that is used for snapping this box to the snapport. The scroll snap area is determined by taking the transformed border box, finding its rectangular bounding box (axis-aligned in the scroll container’s coordinate space), then adding the specified outsets.
trans-unit.target: 该 scroll-margin-block-start 属性定义滚动的边缘处，其用于捕捉此方框，snapport块尺寸的开始捕捉区域。滚动捕捉区域的确定方法是：获取变形的边框，找到其矩形边界框（在滚动容器的坐标空间中轴向对齐），然后添加指定的起点。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-margin-block property is a shorthand property which sets the scroll-margin longhands in the block dimension.
trans-unit.target: 该 scroll-margin-block 属性是一个速记属性它设置在所述块尺寸的涡旋余量longhands。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-margin-blockshorthand property sets the scroll margins of an element in the block dimension.
trans-unit.target: 该 scroll-margin-block 速记属性设置在块尺寸的元件的滚动边距。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-margin-bottom property defines the bottom margin of the scroll snap area that is used for snapping this box to the snapport. The scroll snap area is determined by taking the transformed border box, finding its rectangular bounding box (axis-aligned in the scroll container’s coordinate space), then adding the specified outsets.
trans-unit.target: 在 scroll-margin-bottom 属性定义了用于捕捉此框的snapport滚动捕捉区域的底部边缘。滚动捕捉区域的确定方法是：获取变形的边框，找到其矩形边界框（在滚动容器的坐标空间中轴向对齐），然后添加指定的起点。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-margin-inline-end property defines the margin of the scroll snap area at the end of the inline dimension that is used for snapping this box to the snapport. The scroll snap area is determined by taking the transformed border box, finding its rectangular bounding box (axis-aligned in the scroll container’s coordinate space), then adding the specified outsets.

The scroll snap area is determined by taking the transformed border box, finding its rectangular bounding box (axis-aligned in the scroll container’s coordinate space), then adding the specified outsets.

trans-unit.source: The scroll-margin-inline property is a shorthand property which sets the scroll-margin longhands in the inline dimension.

The scroll snap area is determined by taking the transformed border box, finding its rectangular bounding box (axis-aligned in the scroll container’s coordinate space), then adding the specified outsets.
trans-unit.target: 在 scroll-margin-right 属性定义了用于捕捉此框的snapport滚动捕捉区域的右边缘。滚动捕捉区域的确定方法是：获取变形的边框，找到其矩形边界框（在滚动容器的坐标空间中轴向对齐），然后添加指定的起点。

The scroll snap area is determined by taking the transformed border box, finding its rectangular bounding box (axis-aligned in the scroll container’s coordinate space), then adding the specified outsets.

trans-unit.source: The scroll-margin property is a shorthand property which sets all of the scroll-margin longhands, assigning values much like the margin property does for the margin-* longhands.

trans-unit.target: 在 scroll-margin 速记属性设置一次全部元素的滚动边距，分配值很像 margin 性质确实为元素的利润率。

trans-unit.target: 该 scroll-padding-inline-start 属性定义偏移量中的内联尺寸开始边缘

trans-unit.source: The scroll-paddingshorthand property sets scroll padding on all sides of an element at once, much like the padding property does for padding on an element.

trans-unit.source: The scroll-snap-align property must be used on child elements in order to set the position that scrolling will snap to. The below example demonstrates scroll snapping along the y axis, with scroll-snap-align used on the section element to dictate the point the scrolling should stop.
trans-unit.target: 在 scroll-snap-align 属性必须在子元素，以设置滚动将捕捉到的位置使用。下面的示例演示了沿 y 轴的滚动捕捉，并在section元素上使用了 scroll-snap-align 来指示滚动应停止的点。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-snap-align property specifies the box’s snap position as an alignment of its snap area (as the alignment subject) within its snap container’s snapport (as the alignment container). The two values specify the snapping alignment in the block axis and inline axis, respectively. If only one value is specified, the second value defaults to the same value.
trans-unit.target: 该 scroll-snap-align 属性指定框的搭扣位置作为其卡扣区域的比对（作为取向受试者）其卡扣容器的snapport内（作为对准容器）。这两个值分别指定在块轴和内联轴上的对齐对齐方式。如果仅指定一个值，则第二个值默认为相同值。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-snap-destinationCSS property defines the position in x and y coordinates within the scroll container's visual viewport which element snap points align with.
trans-unit.target: 该 scroll-snap-destination CSS属性定义在滚动容器的视觉范围内的x和y坐标的位置视哪个元素捕捉点对准用。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-snap-points-xCSS property defines the horizontal positioning of snap points within the content of the scroll container they are applied to.
trans-unit.target: 该 scroll-snap-points-x CSS属性定义的捕捉点它们被施加到滚动容器的内容物中的水平位置。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-snap-points-yCSS property defines the vertical positioning of snap points within the content of the scroll container they are applied to.
trans-unit.target: 该 scroll-snap-points-y CSS属性定义的捕捉点它们被施加到滚动容器的内容物内的垂直位置。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-snap-stopCSS property defines whether the scroll container is allowed to "pass over" possible snap positions.
trans-unit.target: 在 scroll-snap-stop CSS属性定义滚动容器是否允许“越过”可能扣位置。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-snap-type-xCSS property defines how strictly snap points are enforced on the horizontal axis of the scroll container in case there is one.
trans-unit.target: 该 scroll-snap-type-x CSS属性定义如何严格捕捉点被强制执行上的滚动容器的水平轴的情况下，有一个。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-snap-type-yCSS property defines how strictly snap points are enforced on the vertical axis of the scroll container in case there is one.
trans-unit.target: 该 scroll-snap-type-y CSS属性定义如何严格捕捉点被强制执行上的滚动容器的垂直轴的情况下，有一个。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-snap-typeCSS property defines how strictly snap points are enforced on the scroll container in case there is one.
trans-unit.target: 在 scroll-snap-type CSS属性定义了严格的捕捉点被强制执行的滚动容器上的情况下，有一个。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-snap-typeCSS property sets how strictly snap points are enforced on the scroll container in case there is one.
trans-unit.target: 在 scroll-snap-type CSS属性设置如何严格捕捉点被强制执行的滚动容器上的情况下，有一个。

trans-unit.source: The scrollbar-color property allows the author to set the color of the scrollbar track and thumb.
trans-unit.target: 在 scrollbar-color 属性允许作者设置滚动条轨道和拇指的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The scrollbar-colorCSS property sets the color of the scrollbar track and thumb.
trans-unit.target: 在 scrollbar-color 的CSS属性设置滚动条轨道和拇指的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The scrollbar-width property allows the author to set the maximum thickness of an element’s scrollbars when they are shown.
trans-unit.target: 的 scrollbar-width 属性允许作者来设定元件的滚动条的最大厚度被示出时，他们。

trans-unit.source: The sepia()CSS function converts the input image to sepia, giving it a warmer, more yellow/brown appearance. Its result is a <filter-function>.
trans-unit.target: 的 sepia() CSS功能的输入图像转换成深褐色，给它一个温暖，更黄/棕色外观。其结果是 <filter-function> 。

trans-unit.source: The sepia()CSSfunction converts the input image to sepia, giving it a warmer, more yellow/brown appearance. Its result is a <filter-function>.
trans-unit.target: 的 sepia() CSS功能将输入图像转换为棕褐，给它一个温暖，更黄/棕色外观。其结果是 <filter-function> 。

trans-unit.source: The setCoords() function is designed to accept as input a MouseEvent and the name of the origin to use when obtaining the coordinates. The implementation is then quite simple. The variables idX and idY are set to strings with the names of the properties corresponding to the coordinates in the given coordinate system. For example, if the value of type is "page", then idX is "pageX" and idY is "pageY".
trans-unit.target: 该 setCoords() 函数被设计成接受作为输入 MouseEvent ，并获得坐标时，原点的名称使用。这样的实现非常简单。变量 idX 和 idY 设置为具有与给定坐标系中的坐标相对应的属性名称的字符串。例如，如果 type 的值为 "page" ，则 idX 为 "pageX" ， idY 为 "pageY" 。

trans-unit.source: The shape-image-threshold property is used to set the threshold of image transparency used to define the area of the image used for the shape. If the value of shape-image-threshold is 0.0 (which is the initial value) then the area must be fully transparent. If the value is 1.0 then it is fully opaque. Values in between mean that you can set a semi-transparent area as the defining area of the shape.
trans-unit.target: 的 shape-image-threshold 属性用于设置用来定义用于形状的图像的区域的图像的透明度的阈值。如果 shape-image-threshold 的值为 0.0 （这是初始值），则该区域必须完全透明。如果值为 1.0 ,则它是完全不透明的。之间的值意味着您可以将半透明区域设置为形状的定义区域。

trans-unit.source: The shape-image-thresholdCSS property defines the alpha channel threshold used to extract the shape using an image as the value for shape-outside.
trans-unit.target: 的 shape-image-threshold 的CSS属性定义用于提取使用图像作为该值的形状的阿尔法通道阈 shape-outside 。

trans-unit.source: The shape-image-thresholdCSS property sets the alpha channel threshold used to extract the shape using an image as the value for shape-outside.
trans-unit.target: 的 shape-image-threshold 的CSS属性设置用于提取使用图像作为该值的形状的阿尔法通道阈 shape-outside 。

trans-unit.source: The shape-margin property
trans-unit.target: 该 shape-margin 财产

trans-unit.source: The shape-outside property allows us to a define a shape. It takes a variety of values, all of which define different shapes, specified in the <basic-shape> datatype. We can start by looking at a very simple case.
trans-unit.target: 该 shape-outside 性质允许我们定义一个形状。它采用各种值，所有值定义不同的形状，这些值在 <basic-shape> 数据类型中指定。我们可以从一个非常简单的案例开始。

trans-unit.source: The shape-outside property is specified using the values from the list below, which define the float area for float elements. The float area determines the shape around which inline content (float elements) wrap.
trans-unit.target: 的 shape-outside 属性使用从下面的列表中的值，它定义了指定浮子面积为浮动元件。浮动区域确定内联内容（浮动元素）环绕的形状。

trans-unit.source: The shape-outsideCSS property defines a shape—which may be non-rectangular—around which adjacent inline content should wrap. By default, inline content wraps around its margin box; shape-outside provides a way to customize this wrapping, making it possible to wrap text around complex objects rather than simple boxes.
trans-unit.target: 的 shape-outside 的CSS属性定义的形状可以是非矩形的，在其周围相邻的内联内容应换行。默认情况下，内联内容环绕其边距框； shape-outside 提供了一种自定义这种换行的方法，从而可以将文本换成复杂对象而不是简单框。

trans-unit.source: The shape descrete feature is specified as one of two acceptable strings, either rect reprsenting a rectangular screen or round representing a circular, oval or elliptical screen.
trans-unit.target: 的 shape descrete特征指定为两个上可接受的字符串中的一个，无论是 rect reprsenting矩形屏幕或 round 代表一个圆形，椭圆形或椭圆形的屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The shapeCSSmedia feature can be used to test the shape of the device to distinguish recrangular and round displays.
trans-unit.target: 的 shape CSS媒体功能可被用来测试装置的形状来区分recrangular和圆形显示器。

trans-unit.source: The sizeCSSat-rule descriptor, used with the @page at-rule, defines the size and orientation of the box which is used to represent a page. Most of the time, this size corresponds to the target size of the printed page if applicable.
trans-unit.target: CSS 规则描述符的 size 与 @page 规则一起使用，定义用于表示页面的框的大小和方向。在大多数情况下，该尺寸对应于打印页面的目标尺寸（如果适用）。

trans-unit.source: The skew() function is specified with either one or two values, which represent the amount of skewing to be applied in each direction.
trans-unit.target: 的 skew() 函数与一个或两个值，它代表歪斜在每个方向上施加的量指定。

trans-unit.source: The skew() function is specified with either one or two values, which represent the amount of skewing to be applied in each direction. If you only specify one value it is used for the x-axis and there will be no skewing on the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 的 skew() 函数与一个或两个值，它代表歪斜在每个方向上施加的量指定。如果仅指定一个值，则将其用于x轴，并且y轴将不会发生任何倾斜。

trans-unit.source: The skew()CSS function defines a transformation that skews an element on the 2D plane. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 的 skew() CSS功能定义了偏斜的二维平面上的元件的变换。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The skew()CSSfunction defines a transformation that skews an element on the 2D plane. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 的 skew() CSS功能定义了偏斜的二维平面上的元件的变换。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The skewX()CSS function defines a transformation that skews an element in the horizontal direction on the 2D plane. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 所述 skewX() CSS功能定义了在偏斜的2D平面上的水平方向上的元件的变换。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The skewX()CSSfunction defines a transformation that skews an element in the horizontal direction on the 2D plane. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 所述 skewX() CSS功能定义了在偏斜的2D平面上的水平方向上的元件的变换。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The skewY()CSS function defines a transformation that skews an element in the vertical direction on the 2D plane. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 的 skewY() CSS功能定义了在偏斜的2D平面上的垂直方向上的元素的转变。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The skewY()CSSfunction defines a transformation that skews an element in the vertical direction on the 2D plane. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 的 skewY() CSS功能定义了在偏斜的2D平面上的垂直方向上的元素的转变。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The speak-as descriptor specifies how a counter symbol constructed with a given @counter-style will be represented in the spoken form. For example, an author can specify a counter symbol to be either spoken as its numerical value or just represented with an audio cue.
trans-unit.target: 该 speak-as 描述指定如何与给定的制造的相对符号 @counter-style 将在口语形式表示。例如，作者可以指定一个计数器符号，或者说是其数字值，还是仅用音频提示来表示。

trans-unit.source: The src CSS descriptor of the @font-face rule specifies the resource containing font data. It is required for the @font-face rule to be valid.
trans-unit.target: @font-face 规则的 src CSS描述符指定包含字体数据的资源。这是必需的 @font-face 的规则是有效的。

trans-unit.source: The start and end values are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 在 start 和 end ，不支持的值。

trans-unit.source: The steps() class of easing functions
trans-unit.target: 缓动函数的 steps() 类

trans-unit.source: The steps() functional notation defines a step function dividing the domain of output values in equidistant steps.
trans-unit.target: 所述 steps() 函数表示法定义了一个阶跃函数除以输出值的域在等距离的步骤。

trans-unit.source: The steps() functional notation defines a step function dividing the domain of output values in equidistant steps.This subclass of step functions are sometimes also called staircase functions.
trans-unit.target: 所述 steps() 函数表示法定义了一个阶跃函数除以输出值的等距steps.This的步骤的功能的子类的域有时也称为楼梯功能。

trans-unit.source: The subgrid value is from Level 2 of the Grid specification and currently only has implementation in Firefox 71 and onwards.
trans-unit.target: 该 subgrid 值从电网规范的2级，目前只落实在Firefox 71起。

trans-unit.source: The symbols descriptor is specified as one or more <symbol>s.
trans-unit.target: 将 symbols 描述符指定为一个或多个 <symbol> 。

trans-unit.source: The symbols descriptor is used within the @counter-style at-rule.
trans-unit.target: 该 symbols 描述符是内使用 @counter-style 的规则。

trans-unit.source: The symbols descriptor must be specified when the value of the system descriptor is cyclic, numeric, alphabetic, symbolic, or fixed. When the additive system is used, use the additive-symbols descriptor instead to specify the symbols.
trans-unit.target: 的 symbols 时的值必须被指定的描述符 system 描述符是 cyclic ， numeric ， alphabetic ， symbolic ，或 fixed 。使用 additive 系统时，请使用 additive-symbols 描述符来指定符号。

trans-unit.source: The symbols descriptor must contain at least two symbols or the counter style is not valid. The first counter symbol provided in the symbols descriptor is interpreted as 1, the next as 2, and so on. This system is also defined strictly over positive counter values.
trans-unit.target: 该 symbols 描述符必须包含至少两个符号或柜台风格是无效的。 symbols 描述符中提供的第一个计数器符号被解释为 1 ，第二个被解释为 2 ，依此类推。还严格按照正计数器值定义此系统。

trans-unit.source: The symbolsCSS descriptor is used to specify the symbols that the specified counter system will use to construct counter representations.
trans-unit.target: 该 symbols CSS描述符用于指定符号指定的柜台系统将用来构造计数器表示。

trans-unit.source: The symbolsCSS descriptor is used to specify the symbols that the specified counter system will use to construct counter representations. A symbol can be a string, image, or identifier. It is used within the @counter-styleat-rule.
trans-unit.target: 该 symbols CSS描述符用于指定符号指定的柜台系统将用来构造计数器表示。符号可以是字符串，图像或标识符。它在 @counter-style at-rule中使用。

trans-unit.source: The system descriptor specifies the algorithm to be used for converting the integer value of a counter to a string representation. It is used in a @counter-style to define the behavior of the defined style.
trans-unit.target: 该 system 描述符指定要用于计数器的整数值转换为字符串表示的算法。它以 @counter-style 使用，以定义所定义样式的行为。

trans-unit.source: The tab-size CSS property is used to customize the width of a tab (U+0009) character.
trans-unit.target: 的 tab-size CSS属性用于自定义标签（的宽度 U+0009 ）字符。

trans-unit.source: The tab-size CSS property is used to customize the width of tab characters (U+0009).
trans-unit.target: 的 tab-size CSS属性用于定制的制表符（U + 0009）的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The table-layout CSS property sets the algorithm used to lay out <table> cells, rows, and columns.
trans-unit.target: 该 table-layout CSS属性集的算法用于布置 <table> 单元格，行和列。

trans-unit.source: The text-align CSS property specifies the horizontal alignment of an inline or table-cell box.This means it works like vertical-align but in the horizontal direction.
trans-unit.target: 的 text-align CSS属性指定的内联或表小区box.This装置它就像水平取向 vertical-align 但在水平方向上。

trans-unit.source: The text-align property is specified in one of the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 该 text-align 属性在下列方式之一指定的：

trans-unit.source: The text-alignCSS property sets the horizontal alignment of a block element or table-cell box. This means it works like vertical-align but in the horizontal direction.
trans-unit.target: 的 text-align CSS属性设置块元素或表单元格框的水平对齐。这意味着它的工作方式类似于 vertical-align 但沿水平方向。

trans-unit.source: The text-combine-uprightCSS property sets the combination of characters into the space of a single character. If the combined text is wider than 1em, the user agent must fit the contents within 1em. The resulting composition is treated as a single upright glyph for layout and decoration. This property only has an effect in vertical writing modes.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-combine-upright CSS属性集的字符组合成单个字符的空间。如果组合文本的宽度大于1em，则用户代理必须使内容适合1em。所得的组合物被视为用于布局和装饰的单个直立字形。此属性仅在垂直书写模式下有效。

trans-unit.source: The text-combine-uprightCSS property specifies the combination of multiple characters into the space of a single character. If the combined text is wider than 1em, the user agent must fit the contents within 1em. The resulting composition is treated as a single upright glyph for layout and decoration. This property only has an effect in vertical writing modes.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-combine-upright CSS属性指定的多个字符组合成单个字符的空间。如果组合文本的宽度大于1em，则用户代理必须使内容适合1em。所得组合物被视为用于布局和装饰的单个竖立字形。此属性仅在垂直书写模式下有效。

trans-unit.source: The text-decoration-colorCSS property sets the color of the decorative additions to text that are specified by text-decoration-line; these include underlines and overlines, strikethroughs, and wavy lines like those typically used to indicate content is misspelled (for example). The specified color applies to all such decorative lines in the scope of the property's value.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-decoration-color CSS属性设置的装饰增添文本由指定的彩色 text-decoration-line ; 这些包括下划线和上划线，删除线和波浪线，例如通常用于指示内容拼写错误的那些（例如）。在属性值的范围内，指定的颜色应用于所有此类装饰线。

trans-unit.source: The text-decoration-colorCSS property sets the color of decorations added to text by text-decoration-line.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-decoration-color CSS属性设置由添加到文本的装饰颜色 text-decoration-line 。

trans-unit.source: The text-decoration-line property is specified as none, or one or more space-separated values from the list below.
trans-unit.target: 的 text-decoration-line 属性指定为 none ，或一个或多个空间分隔值从下面的列表。

trans-unit.source: The text-decoration-lineCSS property sets the kind of decoration that is used on text in an element, such as an underline or overline.
trans-unit.target: 的 text-decoration-line CSS属性集是用于在文本中的元素，如下划线或划线的一种装饰品。

trans-unit.source: The text-decoration-skip-inkCSS property specifies how overlines and underlines are drawn when they pass over glyph ascenders and descenders.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-decoration-skip-ink CSS属性指定当他们越过字形上行字母和下行overlines并强调绘制。

trans-unit.source: The text-decoration-skipCSS property sets what parts of an element’s content any text decoration affecting the element must skip over. It controls all text decoration lines drawn by the element and also any text decoration lines drawn by its ancestors.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-decoration-skip CSS属性集的哪些部分元素的含量的影响元素的任何文本修饰必须跳过。它控制元素绘制的所有文本装饰线，以及其祖先绘制的所有文本装饰线。

trans-unit.source: The text-decoration-styleCSS property sets the style of the lines specified by text-decoration-line. The style applies to all lines that are set with text-decoration-line.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-decoration-style CSS属性设置由指定的线的样式 text-decoration-line 。该样式适用于所有使用 text-decoration-line 设置的行。

trans-unit.source: The text-decoration-thicknessCSS property sets the stroke thickness of the decoration line that is used on text in an element, such as a line-through, underline, or overline.
trans-unit.target: 的 text-decoration-thickness CSS属性设置用于对文本中的元素，如一条线通，下划线，或上划线的装饰线的笔画粗细。

trans-unit.source: The text-decoration property is specified as one or more space-separated values representing the various longhand text-decoration properties.
trans-unit.target: 的 text-decoration 属性指定为代表的各种普通写法文字修饰特性的一个或多个空间分隔值。

trans-unit.source: The text-decorationCSS property sets the appearance of decorative lines on text. It is a shorthand for text-decoration-line, text-decoration-color, and text-decoration-style.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-decoration CSS属性设置的装饰线文本的外观。它是 text-decoration-line ， text-decoration-color 和 text-decoration-style 的简写。

trans-unit.source: The text-decorationshorthandCSS property sets the appearance of decorative lines on text. It is a shorthand for text-decoration-line, text-decoration-color, text-decoration-style, and the newer text-decoration-thickness property.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-decoration 速记CSS属性设置的装饰线文本的外观。它是 text-decoration-line ， text-decoration-color ， text-decoration-style 和更新的 text-decoration-thickness 属性的简写。

trans-unit.source: The text-emphasis-colorCSS property sets the color of emphasis marks. This value can also be set using the text-emphasis shorthand.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-emphasis-color CSS属性设置重点标记的颜色。也可以使用 text-emphasis 速记来设置此值。

trans-unit.source: The text-emphasis-positionCSS property sets where emphasis marks are drawn. Like ruby text, if there isn't enough room for emphasis marks, the line height is increased.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-emphasis-position 的CSS属性集合，其中重点标记绘制。像红宝石文本一样，如果没有足够的空间放置强调标记，则行高会增加。

trans-unit.source: The text-emphasis-styleCSS property defines the type of emphasis used. It can also be set, and reset, using the text-emphasis shorthand.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-emphasis-style CSS属性定义强调使用的类型。也可以使用 text-emphasis 速记来设置和重置它。

trans-unit.source: The text-emphasis-styleCSS property sets the appearance of emphasis marks. It can also be set, and reset, using the text-emphasis shorthand.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-emphasis-style CSS属性设置重点标记的外观。也可以使用 text-emphasis 速记来设置和重置它。

trans-unit.source: The text-emphasis property is quite different from text-decoration. The text-decoration property does not inherit, and the decoration specified is applied across the whole element. However, text-emphasis does inherit, which means it is possible to change emphasis marks for descendents.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-emphasis 属性是完全不同的 text-decoration 。该 text-decoration 财产不继承，以及指定的装修在整个要素应用。但是，文本强调确实会继承，这意味着可以更改后代的强调标记。

trans-unit.source: The text-emphasisCSS property applies emphasis marks to text (except spaces and control characters). It is a shorthand for text-emphasis-style and text-emphasis-color.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-emphasis CSS属性应用于重点标记文本（除空格和控制字符）。这是一个简写为 text-emphasis-style 和 text-emphasis-color 。

trans-unit.source: The text-indent CSS property sets the length of empty space (indentation) that is put before lines of text in a block.
trans-unit.target: 的 text-indent CSS属性设置的是在块中的文本行之前把空的空间（凹槽）的长度。

trans-unit.source: The text-justify CSS property sets what type of justification should be applied to text when text-align: justify; is set on an element.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-justify 什么类型的理由应适用于文本CSS属性集时 text-align : justify; 在元素上设置。

trans-unit.source: The text-justify property is specified as a single keyword chosen from the list of values below.
trans-unit.target: 的 text-justify 属性被指定为从下面的值的列表中选择一个关键字。

trans-unit.source: The text-orientation property is specified as a single keyword from the list below.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-orientation 属性指定为从下面的列表中的一个关键词。

trans-unit.source: The text-orientationCSS property defines the orientation of the text characters in a line. This property only has an effect in vertical mode, that is, when writing-mode is not horizontal-tb. It is useful for controlling the display of languages that use vertical script, and also for making vertical table headers.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-orientation CSS属性定义一个行的文本字符的方向。此属性仅在垂直模式下有效，即，在 writing-mode 不是 horizontal-tb 。这对于控制使用垂直脚本的语言的显示以及制作垂直表标题很有用。

trans-unit.source: The text-orientationCSS property sets the orientation of the text characters in a line. It only affects text in vertical mode (when writing-mode is not horizontal-tb). It is useful for controlling the display of languages that use vertical script, and also for making vertical table headers.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-orientation CSS属性设置在一个行的文本字符的方向。它只影响垂直模式下的文本（当 writing-mode 不是 horizontal-tb ）。这对于控制使用垂直脚本的语言的显示以及制作垂直表标题很有用。

trans-unit.source: The text-overflow property doesn't force an overflow to occur. To make text overflow its container you have to set other CSS properties: overflow and white-space. For example:
trans-unit.target: 该 text-overflow 属性不强制溢出发生。要使文本溢出其容器，您必须设置其他CSS属性： overflow 和 white-space 。例如：

trans-unit.source: The text-overflow property may be specified using one or two values. If one value is given, it specifies overflow behavior for the end of the line (the right end for left-to-right text, the left end for right-to-left text). If two values are given, the first specifies overflow behavior for the left end of the line, and the second specifies it for the right end of the line.
trans-unit.target: 的 text-overflow 特性可以使用一个或两个值来指定。如果给出一个值，则它指定行尾的溢出行为（左到右文本的右端，右到左文本的左端）。如果给出两个值，则第一个指定行左端的溢出行为，第二个指定行右端的溢出行为。

trans-unit.source: The text-overflow property only affects content that is overflowing a block container element in its inline progression direction (not text overflowing at the bottom of a box, for example).
trans-unit.target: 的 text-overflow 属性仅影响在其溢出的块容器元素含量直列前进方向（不是文本溢出在盒的底部，例如）。

trans-unit.source: The text-overflowCSS property determines how overflowed content that is not displayed is signaled to users. It can be clipped, display an ellipsis ('…', U+2026 Horizontal Ellipsis), or display a custom string.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-overflow CSS属性决定不显示被通知给用户如何溢出的内容。可以将其剪切，显示省略号（“ … ”， U+2026 Horizontal Ellipsis ）或显示自定义字符串。

trans-unit.source: The text-overflowCSS property sets how hidden overflow content is signaled to users. It can be clipped, display an ellipsis ('…'), or display a custom string.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-overflow CSS属性设置如何隐藏溢出内容被通知给用户。可以剪切，显示省略号（' … '）或显示自定义字符串。

trans-unit.source: The text-rendering CSS property provides information to the rendering engine about what to optimize for when rendering text.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-rendering CSS属性提供信息，以什么来优化渲染文本时的渲染引擎。

trans-unit.source: The text-shadow CSS property adds shadows to text. It accepts a comma-separated list of shadows to be applied to the text and any of its decorations. Each shadow is described by some combination of X and Y offsets from the element, blur radius, and color.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-shadow CSS属性添加阴影文本。它接受以逗号分隔的阴影列表，该阴影列表将应用于文本及其任何 decorations 。每个阴影由元素的X和Y偏移量，模糊半径和颜色的某种组合来描述。

trans-unit.source: The text-size-adjust property is specified as none, auto, or a <percentage>.
trans-unit.target: 将 text-size-adjust 属性指定为 none ， auto 或 <percentage> 。

trans-unit.source: The text-size-adjustCSS property controls the text inflation algorithm used on some smartphones and tablets. Other browsers will ignore this property.
trans-unit.target: 的 text-size-adjust CSS属性控制在某些智能手机和平板中使用的文本通货膨胀算法。其他浏览器将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: The text-transform CSS property specifies how to capitalize an element's text. It can be used to make text appear in all-uppercase or all-lowercase, or with each word capitalized.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-transform CSS属性指定如何利用元素的文本。它可用于使文本以全大写或全小写形式出现，或者每个单词都大写。

trans-unit.source: The text-transform CSS property specifies how to capitalize an element's text. It can be used to make text appear in all-uppercase or all-lowercase, or with each word capitalized. It also can help improve legibility for ruby.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-transform CSS属性指定如何利用元素的文本。它可用于使文本以全大写或全小写形式出现，或者每个单词都大写。它还可以帮助提高红宝石的可读性。

trans-unit.source: The text-transform property does not work for ::first-line pseudo-elements (also not for the old one-colon syntax). See WebKit bug 3409.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-transform 属性不工作 ::first-line 伪元素（也未对旧的冒号语法）。请参阅WebKit错误3409。

trans-unit.source: The text-transform property does not work for ::first-line pseudo-elements (also not for the old one-colon syntax). See WebKit bug 3409.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-transform 属性不工作 ::first-line 伪元素（也未对旧的冒号语法）。请参阅WebKit错误3409。

trans-unit.source: The text-transform property does not work for ::first-line pseudo-elements (nor for the one-colon syntax). See Chromium bug 129669.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-transform 属性不工作 ::first-line 伪元素（也为一个冒号语法）。参见Chromium bug 129669。

trans-unit.source: The text-transform property takes into account language-specific case mapping rules such as the following:
trans-unit.target: 该 text-transform 属性考虑到语言的具体情况，映射规则，如下列：

trans-unit.source: The text-underline-offset property is specified as a single value from the list below.
trans-unit.target: 的 text-underline-offset 属性指定为从以下列表中的单个值。

trans-unit.source: The text-underline-offsetCSS property sets the offset distance of an underline text decoration line (applied using text-decoration) from its original position.
trans-unit.target: 的 text-underline-offset CSS属性集下划线文本装饰线的偏移距离（使用施加 text-decoration 从其原始位置）。

trans-unit.source: The text-underline-positionCSS property specifies the position of the underline which is set using the text-decoration property's underline value.
trans-unit.target: 在 text-underline-position CSS属性指定它是使用设置的下划线的位置 text-decoration 属性的 underline 的值。

trans-unit.source: The topCSS property participates in specifying the vertical position of a positioned element. It has no effect on non-positioned elements.
trans-unit.target: CSS的 top 属性参与指定所定位元素的垂直位置。它对未定位的元素没有影响。

trans-unit.source: The topCSS property participates in specifying the vertical position of a positioned element. It has no effect on non-positioned elements.
trans-unit.target: CSS的 top 属性参与指定所定位元素的垂直位置。它对未定位的元素没有影响。

trans-unit.source: The touch-action CSS property sets how a region can be manipulated by a touchscreen user (for example, by zooming features built into the browser).
trans-unit.target: 该 touch-action 的CSS属性集如何的区域可以通过在触摸屏用户操纵（例如，通过放大内置于浏览器的功能）。

trans-unit.source: The touch-action CSS property sets how an element's region can be manipulated by a touchscreen user (for example, by zooming features built into the browser).
trans-unit.target: 该 touch-action 的CSS属性集如何一个元素的区域可以通过在触摸屏用户操纵（例如，通过放大内置于浏览器的功能）。

trans-unit.source: The touch-action property may be specified as either:
trans-unit.target: 该 touch-action 属性可以被指定为：

trans-unit.source: The transform-box CSS property defines the layout box to which the transform and transform-origin properties relate.
trans-unit.target: 的 transform-box CSS属性定义了该布局框 transform 和 transform-origin 性质涉及。

trans-unit.source: The transform-box property is specified as one of the keyword values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 将 transform-box 属性指定为下面列出的关键字值之一。

trans-unit.source: The transform-origin property may be specified using one, two, or three values, where each value represents an offset. Offsets that are not explicitly defined are reset to their corresponding initial values.
trans-unit.target: 的 transform-origin 属性可以使用一个，两个或三个值，其中每个值表示偏移来指定。未明确定义的偏移量将重置为其相应的初始值。

trans-unit.source: The transform-originCSS property sets the origin for an element's transformations.
trans-unit.target: 该 transform-origin CSS属性设置为元素的转换原点。

trans-unit.source: The transform-styleCSS property sets whether children of an element are positioned in the 3D space or are flattened in the plane of the element.
trans-unit.target: 该 transform-style CSS属性集是否元素的儿童被定位在3D空间或元素的平面被夷为平地。

trans-unit.source: The transform property may be specified as either the keyword value none or as one or more <transform-function> values.
trans-unit.target: 可以将 transform 属性指定为 none 关键字值或一个或多个 <transform-function> 值。

trans-unit.source: The transformCSS property lets you rotate, scale, skew, or translate an element. It modifies the coordinate space of the CSS visual formatting model.
trans-unit.target: 该 transform CSS属性可以旋转，缩放，倾斜或翻译的元素。它修改了CSS 视觉格式模型的坐标空间。

trans-unit.source: The transition-delay CSS property specifies the duration to wait before starting a property's transition effect when its value changes.
trans-unit.target: 在 transition-delay CSS属性指定的时间以等待启动特性的前过渡效果时，其价值变化。

trans-unit.source: The transition-durationCSS property sets the length of time a transition animation should take to complete. By default, the value is 0s, meaning that no animation will occur.
trans-unit.target: 在 transition-duration CSS属性设置时间的过渡动画应该完成的长度。默认情况下，该值为 0s ，这意味着将不发生动画。

trans-unit.source: The transition-durationCSS property sets the length of time a transition animation should take to complete. By default, the value is 0s, meaning that no animation will occur.
trans-unit.target: 在 transition-duration CSS属性设置时间的过渡动画应该完成的长度。默认情况下，该值为 0s ，表示不会发生动画。

trans-unit.source: The transition-propertyCSS property sets the CSS properties to which a transition effect should be applied.
trans-unit.target: 的 transition-property 的CSS属性设置到其上的CSS属性过渡效果应适用。

trans-unit.source: The transition-timing-function CSS property sets how intermediate values are calculated for CSS properties being affected by a transition effect.
trans-unit.target: 所述 transition-timing-function CSS属性值集合如何中间体CSS属性计算受着过渡效果。

trans-unit.source: The transition property is specified as one or more single-property transitions, separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 的 transition 属性被指定为一个或多个单属性的转变，用逗号分开。

trans-unit.source: The transitionCSS property is a shorthand property for transition-property, transition-duration, transition-timing-function, and transition-delay.
trans-unit.target: 所述 transition CSS属性是一个速记属性为 transition-property ， transition-duration ， transition-timing-function ，和 transition-delay 。

trans-unit.source: The translate() function is specified as either one or two values.
trans-unit.target: 将 translate() 函数指定为一个或两个值。

trans-unit.source: The translate()CSS function repositions an element in the horizontal and/or vertical directions. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 的 translate() CSS功能重新定位在水平和/或垂直方向上的元件。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The translate()CSSfunction repositions an element in the horizontal and/or vertical directions. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 的 translate() CSS功能重新定位在水平和/或垂直方向上的元件。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The translate3d()CSS function repositions an element in 3D space. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 所述 translate3d() CSS功能重新定位在三维空间中的一个元素。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The translate3d()CSSfunction repositions an element in 3D space. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 所述 translate3d() CSS功能重新定位在三维空间中的一个元素。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The translateCSS property allows you to specify translation transforms individually and independantly of the transform property. This maps better to typical user interface usage, and saves having to remember the exact order of transform functions to specify in the transform value.
trans-unit.target: 该 translate CSS属性可以单独和independantly的的指定平移变换 transform 属性。这样可以更好地映射到典型的用户界面用法，并且省去了记住要在 transform 值中指定的转换函数的确切顺序的麻烦。

trans-unit.source: The translateCSS property allows you to specify translation transforms individually and independently of the transform property. This maps better to typical user interface usage, and saves having to remember the exact order of transform functions to specify in the transform value.
trans-unit.target: 该 translate CSS属性，可以单独且独立于指定的翻译变换 transform 属性。这样可以更好地映射到典型的用户界面用法，并且省去了记住要在 transform 值中指定的转换函数的确切顺序的麻烦。

trans-unit.target: 所述 translateX() CSS功能重新定位水平上的二维平面的元件。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。
