trans-unit.source: The translateY()CSS function repositions an element vertically on the 2D plane. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 所述 translateY() CSS功能重新定位垂直于二维平面的元件。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The translateY()CSSfunction repositions an element vertically on the 2D plane. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 所述 translateY() CSS功能重新定位垂直于二维平面的元件。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The translateZ()CSS function repositions an element along the z-axis in 3D space, i.e., closer to or farther away from the viewer. Its result is a <transform-function> data type.
trans-unit.target: 所述 translateZ() CSS功能重新定位沿在三维空间中z轴的元素，即，更接近或更远离观看者。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.target: 所述 translateZ() CSS功能重新定位沿在三维空间中z轴的元素，即，更接近或更远离观看者。其结果是 <transform-function> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The transparent keyword has been removed as it is now a part of the <color> data type.
trans-unit.target: 所述 transparent 的关键字已被删除，因为它现在是一部分 <color> 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The transparent keyword represents a fully transparent color. This makes the background behind the colored item completely visible. Technically, transparent is a shortcut for rgba(0,0,0,0).
trans-unit.target: 所述 transparent 关键字表示完全透明的颜色。这样可以使彩色项目后面的背景完全可见。从技术上讲， transparent 是 rgba(0,0,0,0) 的快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: The unicode-bidi and direction properties are the only properties that are not affected by the all shorthand.
trans-unit.target: 在 unicode-bidi 和 direction 属性是不会受的唯一属性 all 的简写。

trans-unit.source: The unicode-bidiCSS property, together with the direction property, determines how bidirectional text in a document is handled. For example, if a block of content contains both left-to-right and right-to-left text, the user-agent uses a complex Unicode algorithm to decide how to display the text. The unicode-bidi property overrides this algorithm and allows the developer to control the text embedding.
trans-unit.target: 的 unicode-bidi CSS特性，与一起 direction 属性，确定如何在文档中双向文本进行处理。例如，如果内容块包含从左到右和从右到左的文本，则用户代理将使用复杂的Unicode算法来决定如何显示文本。在 unicode-bidi 属性将覆盖此算法，并允许开发者控制文本嵌入。

trans-unit.source: The unicode-range CSS descriptor sets the specific range of characters to be used from a font defined by @font-face and made available for use on the current page. If the page doesn't use any character in this range, the font is not downloaded; if it uses at least one, the whole font is downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 的 unicode-range CSS描述符设置要由所定义的字体中使用的字符的特定范围 @font-face 和用于在当前页上使用提供。如果页面在此范围内未使用任何字符，则不会下载字体；如果使用至少一种，则将下载整个字体。

trans-unit.source: The unset CSS keyword resets a property to its inherited value if it inherits from its parent, and to its initial value if not. In other words, it behaves like the inherit keyword in the first case, and like the initial keyword in the second case. It can be applied to any CSS property, including the CSS shorthand all.
trans-unit.target: 如果未 unset CSS关键字从其父级继承，则将关键字重置为该属性的继承值，否则将其重置为初始值。换句话说，在第一种情况下，它的行为类似于 inherit 关键字，在第二种情况下，其行为与 initial 关键字类似。它可以应用于任何CSS属性，包括CSS速记 all 。

trans-unit.source: The unset CSS keyword resets a property to its inherited value if the property naturally inherits from its parent, and to its initial value if not. In other words, it behaves like the inherit keyword in the first case, when the property is an inherited property, and like the initial keyword in the second case, when the property is a non-inherited property.
trans-unit.target: 在 unset CSS关键字重置为继承值的属性如果属性自然会继承其父和其初始值，如果不。换句话说，它的行为就像 inherit 在第一种情况下的关键字，当属性是一个继承的属性，而像 initial 在第二种情况下的关键字，当属性是一个非继承属性。

trans-unit.source: The unset keyword acts as either inherit or initial, depending on whether the property is inherited or not.
trans-unit.target: 在 unset 关键字作为任一 inherit 或 initial ，这取决于属性是否继承或没有。

trans-unit.source: The update feature is specified as a single keyword value chosen from the list below.
trans-unit.target: 的 update 功能被指定为从下面的列表中选择一个关键字值。

trans-unit.source: The updateCSSmedia feature can be used to test how frequently (if at all) the output device is able to modify the appearance of content.
trans-unit.target: 该 update CSS 媒体功能可用于测试的输出设备是如何频繁地（如果有的话）能够修改内容的外观。

trans-unit.source: The user-modify property has no effect in Firefox. It was originally planned to determine whether or not the content of an element can be edited by a user.
trans-unit.target: 该 user-modify 属性在Firefox中没有任何影响。最初计划确定元素的内容是否可以由用户编辑。

trans-unit.source: The user-zoomCSS descriptor controls whether or not the user can change the zoom factor of a document defined by @viewport.
trans-unit.target: 所述 user-zoom CSS描述符控制是否用户可以改变由所定义的文档的缩放因子 @viewport 。

trans-unit.source: The var() function cannot be used in property names, selectors or anything else besides property values. (Doing so usually produces invalid syntax, or else a value whose meaning has no connection to the variable.)
trans-unit.target: 该 var() 函数不能在属性名称，选择或任何东西，除了属性值还可以使用。（这样做通常会产生无效的语法，否则会产生其含义与变量无关的值。）

trans-unit.source: The var()CSS function can be used to insert the value of a custom property (sometimes called a "CSS variable") instead of any part of a value of another property.
trans-unit.target: 该 var() CSS功能可用于插入的值自定义属性，而不是另一种性质的值的任何部分（有时称为“CSS变量”）。

trans-unit.target: 该 vertical-align CSS属性设置一个内联，内联块或表单元格框的垂直取向。

trans-unit.source: The vertical-alignCSS property specifies sets vertical alignment of an inline or table-cell box.
trans-unit.target: 该 vertical-align CSS属性指定组内联或表单元格框的垂直取向。

trans-unit.source: The viewport-fit CSS @viewportdescriptor controls how a document's viewport fills the screen.
trans-unit.target: 在 viewport-fit CSS @viewport 描述符控制文档的视口如何填充屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The visibility CSS property shows or hides an element without changing the layout of a document. The property can also hide rows or columns in a <table>.
trans-unit.target: 的 visibility CSS属性显示或隐藏的元件而不改变文档的布局。该属性还可以隐藏 <table> 中的行或列。

trans-unit.source: The white-space CSS property sets how white space inside an element is handled.
trans-unit.target: 在 white-space CSS属性设置如何空格元素内部处理。

trans-unit.source: The white-space CSS property sets how white space inside an element is handled.
trans-unit.target: 在 white-space CSS属性设置元素中空白的处理方式。

trans-unit.source: The white-space property is specified as a single keyword chosen from the list of values below.
trans-unit.target: 将 white-space 属性指定为从下面的值列表中选择的单个关键字。

trans-unit.source: The widowsCSS property sets the minimum number of lines in a block container that must be shown at the top of a page, region, or column.
trans-unit.target: 的 widows CSS属性设置在一个块容器线必须在被显示的最小数目顶一个的页面，区域或柱。

trans-unit.source: The width CSS property sets an element's width. By default it sets the width of the content area, but if box-sizing is set to border-box, it sets the width of the border area.
trans-unit.target: 该 width CSS属性设置元素的宽度。默认情况下，它设置内容区域的宽度，但是如果 box-sizing 设置为 border-box ，则它设置边界区域的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width CSS property sets an element's width. By default, it sets the width of the content area, but if box-sizing is set to border-box, it sets the width of the border area.
trans-unit.target: 该 width CSS属性设置元素的宽度。默认情况下，它设置内容区域的宽度，但是如果 box-sizing 设置为 border-box ，则它设置边框区域的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width feature is specified as a <length> value representing the viewport width. It is a range feature, meaning that you can also use the prefixed min-width and max-width variants to query minimum and maximum values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 的 width 特征被指定为 <length> 表示视口宽度值。这是一个范围功能，这意味着您还可以使用前缀的 min-width 和 max-width 变体分别查询最小值和最大值。

trans-unit.source: The width property controls the size of the viewport. It should preferable be set to device-width, which is the width of the screen in CSS pixels at a scale of 100%. There are other properties, including maximum-scale, minimum-scale, and user-scalable that control whether users can zoom the page in or out, but the default values are the best for accessibility and user experience, and can be omitted.
trans-unit.target: 的 width 属性控制视口的大小。最好将其设置为 device-width ，它是屏幕宽度，以CSS像素为单位，比例为100％。还有其他属性，包括 maximum-scale ， minimum-scale 和 user-scalable ，它们控制用户是否可以放大或缩小页面，但是默认值对于可访问性和用户体验而言是最佳的，因此可以省略。

trans-unit.source: The width property is specified as either:
trans-unit.target: 的 width 属性被指定为：

trans-unit.source: The widthCSSmedia feature can be used to test the width of the viewport (or the page box, for paged media).
trans-unit.target: 的 width CSS 媒体功能可用于测试的宽度视口（或页框中，页面媒体）。

trans-unit.source: The will-changeCSS property hints to browsers how an element is expected to change. Browsers may set up optimizations before an element is actually changed. These kinds of optimizations can increase the responsiveness of a page by doing potentially expensive work before they are actually required.
trans-unit.target: 的 will-change CSS属性的提示，浏览器如何元素有望改变。浏览器可以在实际更改元素之前设置优化。这些优化可以通过在实际需要之前进行潜在的昂贵工作来提高页面的响应速度。

trans-unit.source: The window.getComputedStyle method, and similar functions such as element.querySelector, will always return values indicating that a user has never visited any of the links on a page.
trans-unit.target: 该 window.getComputedStyle 方法，以及类似的功能，如 element.querySelector ，将始终返回指示用户从未访问过的任何一个页面上的链接的价值。

trans-unit.source: The word-break property is specified as a single keyword chosen from the list of values below.
trans-unit.target: 的 word-break 属性指定为从下面的值的列表中选择一个关键字。

trans-unit.source: The word-spacingCSS property sets the length of space between words and between tags.
trans-unit.target: 的 word-spacing 的CSS属性设置字之间和标签之间的空间的长度。

trans-unit.source: The writing-mode property and block flow
trans-unit.target: 在 writing-mode 属性和块流

trans-unit.source: The writing-mode property is specified as one of the values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 将 writing-mode 属性指定为下面列出的值之一。

trans-unit.source: The writing-mode property is specified as one of the values listed below. The flow direction in horizontal scripts is also affected by the directionality of that script, either left-to-right (ltr, like English and most other languages) or right-to-left (rtl, like Hebrew or Arabic).
trans-unit.target: 将 writing-mode 属性指定为下面列出的值之一。水平脚本的流向也受该脚本的方向性影响，即从左到右（ ltr ，例如英语和大多数其他语言）或从右到左（ rtl ，例如希伯来语或阿拉伯语）。

trans-unit.source: The writing-mode values sideways-lr and sideways-rl were removed from the CSS Writing Modes Level 3 specification late in its design process. They may be restored in Level 4.
trans-unit.target: 该 writing-mode 值 sideways-lr 和 sideways-rl 是从CSS写作模式等级在其设计过程中除去3规格晚。它们可以在4级恢复。

trans-unit.source: The writing-modeCSS property sets whether lines of text are laid out horizontally or vertically, as well as the direction in which blocks progress.
trans-unit.target: 在 writing-mode 的CSS属性集是否文本行被水平或垂直地布置，以及其中块前进方向。

trans-unit.source: The writing-modeCSS property sets whether lines of text are laid out horizontally or vertically, as well as the direction in which blocks progress. When set for an entire document, it should be set on the root element (html element for HTML documents).
trans-unit.target: 在 writing-mode 的CSS属性集是否文本行被水平或垂直地布置，以及其中块前进方向。为整个文档设置时，应在根元素（HTML文档的 html 元素）上进行设置。

trans-unit.source: The z-index CSS property sets the z-order of a positioned element and its descendants or flex items. Overlapping elements with a larger z-index cover those with a smaller one.
trans-unit.target: 的 z-index CSS属性设置一个的z顺序定位元件和其后代或挠曲的项目。z-index较大的重叠元素将覆盖较小的元素。

trans-unit.source: The z-index property can be specified with an integer value (positive, zero, or negative), which represents the position of the element along the z-axis. If you are not familiar with the z-axis, imagine the page as a stack of layers, each one having a number. Layers are rendered in numerical order, with larger numbers above smaller numbers.
trans-unit.target: 的 z-index 属性可以具有整数值（正，零或负的），其表示沿z轴的元件的位置来指定。如果您不熟悉z轴，请将页面想象成一叠层，每层都有一个数字。图层按数字顺序渲染，数字越大，数字越小。

trans-unit.source: The z-index property is specified as either the keyword auto or an <integer>.
trans-unit.target: 将 z-index 属性指定为关键字 auto 或 <integer> 。

trans-unit.source: The zoomCSS descriptor sets the initial zoom factor of a document defined by the @viewportat-rule.
trans-unit.target: 该 zoom CSS的描述符集被定义的文件的初始放大倍数 @viewport 的规则。

trans-unit.source: The || combinator selects nodes which belong to a column.
trans-unit.target: 该 || 组合器选择属于列的节点。

trans-unit.source: The ~ combinator selects siblings. This means that the second element follows the first (though not necessarily immediately), and both share the same parent.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ~ 组合子选择兄弟姐妹。这意味着第二个元素紧随第一个元素（尽管不一定紧随其后），并且都共享相同的父元素。

trans-unit.source: The absolute positioning scheme - positions a box within an absolute coordinate system that is established by its containing element. An absolutely positioned element can cover other elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述绝对定位方案-位置是由包含元素建立了一个绝对坐标系统内的一个方块。绝对定位的元素可以覆盖其他元素。

trans-unit.source: The asterisk multiplier indicates that the entity may appear zero, one or several times.
trans-unit.target: 的星号乘数表示该实体可能会出现零个，一个或数次。

trans-unit.source: The block flow direction is the direction in which boxes, for example paragraphs, stack in that writing mode. The CSS writing-mode property controls the block flow direction. If you want to change your page, or part of your page, to vertical-lr then you can set writing-mode: vertical-lr on the element and this will change the direction of the blocks and therefore the inline direction as well.
trans-unit.target: 所述块的流动方向是其中盒，例如段落，堆栈在写入模式的方向。CSS书写模式属性控制块的流向。如果要将页面或页面的一部分更改为 vertical-lr ,则可以在元素上设置 writing-mode: vertical-lr ，这将更改块的方向，因此也将更改内联方向。

trans-unit.source: The curly braces multiplier, enclosing two integers separated by a comma, A and B, indicates that the entity must appear at least A times and at most B times.
trans-unit.target: 在花括号乘法器，包围两个整数分离用逗号，A和B，指示该实体必须出现至少A倍且至多乙倍。

trans-unit.source: The exclamation point multiplier after a group indicates that the group is required, and must produce at least one value; even if the grammar of the items within the group would otherwise allow the entire contents to be omitted, at least one component value must not be omitted.
trans-unit.target: 一组后的感叹号乘数表示该组是必需的，并且必须产生至少一个值；即使该组中项目的语法否则将允许省略全部内容，也不得省略至少一个成分值。

trans-unit.source: The floats algorithm - extracts the box from the normal flow and put it to the side of the containing box.
trans-unit.target: 所述浮子算法-提取从正常流动的盒，并把它与含箱的侧面。

trans-unit.source: The hash mark multiplier indicates that the entity may be repeated one or more times (for example, the plus multiplier), but each occurrence is separated by a comma (',').
trans-unit.target: 的哈希标记乘数表示该实体可以被重复一次或多次（例如，加上乘法器），但是每次出现时由逗号分隔（“”）。

trans-unit.source: The inline axis runs across the block axis, it is the direction in which text in regular inline flow runs.
trans-unit.target: 的内联轴跨过块轴线运行时，它是在哪个方向文本在常规内嵌流量运行。

trans-unit.source: The logical operatorsnot, and, and only can be used to compose a complex media query. You can also combine multiple media queries into a single rule by separating them with commas.
trans-unit.target: 的逻辑运算符 not ， and ，并且 only 可以用于构成一个复杂的媒体查询。您还可以通过用逗号分隔多个媒体查询，将它们组合为一个规则。

trans-unit.source: The normal flow - positions each box one after the other.
trans-unit.target: 在正常流动 -位置后，其他每个箱子一个。

trans-unit.source: The plus multiplier indicates that the entity may appear one or several times.
trans-unit.target: 在加上乘数表明实体可能会出现一次或多次。

trans-unit.source: The question mark multiplier indicates that the entity is optional, and must appear zero or one time.
trans-unit.target: 该问号乘数表明该实体是可选的，必须出现零次或一次。

trans-unit.source: The starting point is the location on the gradient line where the first color begins. The ending point is the point where the last color ends. Each of these two points is defined by the intersection of the gradient line with a perpendicular line passing from the box corner which is in the same quadrant. The ending point can be simply understood as the symmetrical point of the starting point. These somewhat complex definitions lead to an interesting effect sometimes called magic corners: the corners nearest to the starting and ending points have the same color as their respective starting or ending points.
trans-unit.target: 的起点是在所述第一颜色开始渐变线的位置。的终点是点最后颜色的结束位置。这两个点中的每一个都由渐变线与从位于同一象限的框角经过的垂直线的交点定义。终点可以简单地理解为起点的对称点。这些稍微复杂的定义会产生有趣的效果，有时也称为魔术角：最接近起点和终点的角与各自的起点或终点具有相同的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The vanishing point is by default placed at the center of the element, but its position can be changed using the perspective-origin property.

trans-unit.source: The background-size CSS property lets you resize the background image of an element, overriding the default behavior of tiling the image at its full size by specifying the width and/or height of the image. By doing so, you can scale the image upward or downward as desired.
trans-unit.target: 该 background-size CSS属性可以调整元素的背景图像，覆盖通过指定图像的宽度和/或高度平铺在其全尺寸图像的默认行为。这样，您可以根据需要向上或向下缩放图像。

trans-unit.source: The CSS Multi-column Layout Module extends the block layout mode to allow the easy definition of multiple columns of text. People have trouble reading text if lines are too long; if it takes too long for the eyes to move from the end of the one line to the beginning of the next, they lose track of which line they were on. Therefore, to make maximum use of a large screen, authors should have limited-width columns of text placed side by side, just as newspapers do.
trans-unit.target: 的CSS多列布局模块延伸的块布局模式以允许文本的多个列的简单的定义。如果行太长，人们将难以阅读文本。如果眼睛从一行的结尾移到下一行的开头花费的时间太长，则他们将无法跟踪到所在的行。因此，为了最大程度地利用大屏幕，作者应该像报纸一样，将并排放置的有限宽度的文本列放置。

trans-unit.source: The CSS Overflow module contains the features of CSS relating to scrollable overflow handling in visual media. In CSS overflow happens when the content of a box extends past one or more of the box's edges.
trans-unit.target: 该CSS溢出模块包含CSS有关滚动溢出处理在视觉媒体的功能。在CSS中，当框的内容超出框的一个或多个边缘时会发生溢出。

trans-unit.source: The Box Model does not fully apply to items participating in an inline formatting context. In a horizontal writing mode line, horizontal padding, borders and margin will be applied to the element and push the text away left and right. However, margins above and below the element will not be applied. Vertical padding and borders will be applied but may overlap content above and below as, in the inline formatting context, the line boxes will not be pushed apart by padding and borders.
trans-unit.target: 方框模式并不完全适用于参与内联格式化上下文的项目。在水平书写模式行中,水平填充、边框和边距将被应用到元素上,并将文字向左和向右推开。但是,元素上方和下方的边距将不会被应用。垂直填充和边框将被应用,但可能会与上方和下方的内容重叠,因为在行内格式化上下文中,行框不会被填充和边框推开。

The CSS specification defines shorthand properties to group the definition of common properties acting on the same theme. For instance, the CSS background property is a shorthand property that's able to define the values of background-color, background-image, background-repeat, and background-position. Similarly, the most common font-related properties can be defined using the shorthand font, and the different margins around a box can be defined using the margin shorthand.
trans-unit.target: CSS规范定义了速记属性，以对作用于同一主题的通用属性的定义进行分组。例如，CSS background 属性是一种简写属性，可以定义 background-color ， background-image ， background-repeat 和 background-position 的值。类似地，可以使用速记 font 定义最常见的字体相关属性，并且可以使用 margin 速记来定义框周围的不同边距。

trans-unit.source: The Grid specification originally contained the definition for the properties grid-row-gap, grid-column-gap and grid-gap. This allows them to be used for other layout methods where a gap between items makes sense.
trans-unit.target: Grid规范最初包含属性 grid-row-gap ， grid-column-gap 和 grid-gap 的定义。从那时起，它们已移入Box Alignment规范中，并重命名为 row-gap ， column-gap 和 gap 。这使它们可以用于其他在布局之间有意义的布局方法。

trans-unit.source: The Italic (ital) axis works differently in that it is either on or off; there is no in-between. Italic designs often include dramatically different letterforms from their upright counterparts, so in the transition from upright to italic, a number of glyph (or character) substitutions usually occur. Italic and oblique are often used somewhat interchangeably, but in truth are actually quite different. Oblique is defined in this context with the term slant (see the below section), and a typeface would typically have one or the other, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 斜体（ ital ）轴的工作方式不同，它是开或关; 之间没有任何关系。斜体设计通常包括与直立字体截然不同的字母，因此在从直立到斜体的过渡中，通常会出现许多字形（或字符）替换。斜体和斜体通常可以互换使用，但实际上实际上是完全不同的。在这种情况下，倾斜是用术语“ slant 定义的（请参见下一节），并且一个字体通常会具有一个或另一个，但不能同时具有两者。

trans-unit.source: The Japanese half-width katakana was used to represent katakana in 8-bit character codes. Unlike regular (full-width) katakana characters, a letter with dakuten (voiced sound mark) is represented as two code points, the body of letter and dakuten. The full-width combines these into a single code point when converting these characters into full-width.
trans-unit.target: 日文半角片假名用于以8位字符代码表示片假名。与常规（全角）片假名字符不同，带有dakuten（语音标记）的字母表示为两个代码点，即字母正文和dakuten。的 full-width 将这些字符转换成全宽时组合这些成一个单一的代码点。

trans-unit.source: The above will put a semi-transparent black mask over the Firefox logo background image. Had we used the background-color property instead, the color would have appeared behind the logo image instead of on top of it. Additionally, the entire container would have had the same background color. Because we used image() along with the background-size property (and prevented the image from repeating with the background-repeat property, the color swatch will only cover a quarter of the container.
trans-unit.target: 上面将在Firefox徽标背景图像上放置一个半透明的黑色蒙版。如果我们改为使用 background-color 属性，则该颜色将显示在徽标图像的后面而不是其顶部。此外，整个容器将具有相同的背景色。因为我们将 image() 与 background-size 属性一起使用（并防止图像以 background-repeat 属性重复出现，所以色样将仅覆盖容器的四分之一。

trans-unit.source: The aim of the CSS Containment specification is to improve performance of web pages by allowing developers to isolate a subtree of the page from the rest of the page. If the browser knows that a part of the page is independent, rendering can be optimized and performance improved. The specification defines a single CSS property contain. This document describes the basic aims of the specification.
trans-unit.target: CSS包含规范的目的是通过允许开发人员将页面的子树与页面的其余部分隔离开来，从而提高网页的性能。如果浏览器知道页面的一部分是独立的，则可以优化渲染并提高性能。该规范定义了一个CSS属性 contain s。本文档描述了规范的基本目的。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm can for the most part be summarized by these four rules. There are some edge cases that aren't covered by these rules, but this covers the majority of cases.
trans-unit.target: 算法大部分情况下可以用这四条规则来概括。有一些边缘情况没有被这些规则所覆盖,但这涵盖了大部分情况。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm, in summary

trans-unit.source: The alignment container
trans-unit.target: 校准容器

trans-unit.source: The alignment container is the positioned block, accounting for the offset values of top, left, bottom, and right. The normal keyword resolves to stretch, unless the positioned item is a replaced element, in which case it resolves to start.
trans-unit.target: 对齐容器是定位的块，说明了上，左，下和右的偏移值。除非定位的项目是被替换的元素，否则normal关键字解析为 stretch ，在这种情况下，它解析为 start 。

trans-unit.source: The alignment is done after the lengths and auto margins are applied, meaning that, if in a Flexbox layout there is at least one flexible element, with flex-grow different from 0, it will have no effect as there won't be any available space.
trans-unit.target: 对齐是在应用长度和自动页边距之后完成的，这意味着，如果在Flexbox布局中至少有一个 flex-grow 不同于 0 的flexable元素，则将无效，因为将没有可用的空间。

trans-unit.source: The alignment properties from the flexbox specification have been added to a new specification called Box Alignment Level 3. This means that they can be used in other specifications, including Grid Layout. In the future, they may well apply to other layout methods as well.
trans-unit.target: flexbox规范中的对齐属性已添加到称为Box Alignment Level 3的新规范中。这意味着它们可以用于其他规范，包括网格布局。将来，它们很可能也会应用于其他布局方法。

trans-unit.source: The alignment property vertical-align has no effect on a grid item. In layouts using display: inline-block or display: table, you might use the vertical-align property to perform basic alignment. In your grid layout you then have the far more powerful box alignment properties.
trans-unit.target: 对齐属性 vertical-align 对网格项目没有影响。在使用 display: inline-block 或 display: table 的布局中，您可以使用vertical-align属性执行基本对齐。在网格布局中，您将拥有更强大的框对齐属性。

trans-unit.source: The alignment subject

trans-unit.source: The all value requires markup around every piece of horizontal text, but it is currently supported by more browsers than the digits value.
trans-unit.target: 全值需要在每一段水平文本周围进行标记,但目前支持它的浏览器比数字值更多。

trans-unit.source: The allowed value for column-gap is a <length-percentage>, this means percentages are allowed. Percentage values for column-gap are calculated as a percentage of the width of the multicol container.
trans-unit.target: 对于允许值 column-gap 是一个 <length-percentage> ，这个装置的百分比是允许的。 column-gap 百分比值计算为multicol容器宽度的百分比。

trans-unit.source: The alpha component of the allowed styles will be ignored. The alpha component of the element's non-:visited state will be used instead, except when that component is 0, in which case the style set in :visited will be ignored entirely.
trans-unit.target: 允许样式的alpha分量将被忽略。将会使用元素的non- :visited 状态的alpha分量，除非该分量为 0 ，否则，将完全忽略 :visited 中设置的样式。

trans-unit.source: The alpha values of the mask border image are used as the mask values.
trans-unit.target: 遮罩边框图像的α值被用作遮罩值。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotation created by rotate() is specified by an <angle>. If positive, the movement will be clockwise; if negative, it will be counter-clockwise. A rotation by 180° is called point reflection.
trans-unit.target: 由 rotate() 创建的旋转量由 <angle> 指定。如果为正，则运动将为顺时针；否则为正。如果为负，则为逆时针方向。旋转180°称为点反射。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotation created by rotate3d() is specified by three <number>s and one <angle>. The <number>s represent the x-, y-, and z-coordinates of the vector denoting the axis of rotation. The <angle> represents the angle of rotation; if positive, the movement will be clockwise; if negative, it will be counter-clockwise.
trans-unit.target: 由 rotate3d() 创建的旋转量由三个 <number> 和一个 <angle> 指定。所述 <number> s为x轴，y轴和表示旋转轴的矢量的z坐标。所述 <angle> 表示旋转的角度; 如果为正，则运动将为顺时针；如果为负，则为逆时针方向。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotation created by rotateX() is specified by an <angle>. If positive, the movement will be clockwise; if negative, it will be counter-clockwise.
trans-unit.target: 由 rotateX() 创建的旋转量由 <angle> 指定。如果为正，则运动将为顺时针；否则为正。如果为负，则为逆时针方向。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotation created by rotateY() is specified by an <angle>. If positive, the movement will be clockwise; if negative, it will be counter-clockwise.
trans-unit.target: 由 rotateY() 创建的旋转量由 <angle> 指定。如果为正，则运动将为顺时针；否则为正。如果为负，则为逆时针方向。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotation created by rotateZ() is specified by an <angle>. If positive, the movement will be clockwise; if negative, it will be counter-clockwise.
trans-unit.target: 由 rotateZ() 创建的旋转量由 <angle> 指定。如果为正，则运动将为顺时针；否则为正。如果为负，则为逆时针方向。

trans-unit.source: The amount of the conversion, specified as a <number> or a <percentage>. A value of 0% is completely transparent, while a value of 100% leaves the input unchanged. Values between 0% and 100% are linear multipliers on the effect. The lacuna value for interpolation is 1.
trans-unit.target: 转换量，指定为 <number> 或 <percentage> 。值为 0% 是完全透明的，而值为 100% 会使输入保持不变。 0% 到 100% 之间的值是效果的线性乘数。插值的空白值是 1 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of the conversion, specified as a <number> or a <percentage>. A value of 100% is completely grayscale, while a value of 0% leaves the input unchanged. Values between 0% and 100% are linear multipliers on the effect. Default value when omitted is 1. The initial value for interpolation is 0.
trans-unit.target: 转换量，指定为 <number> 或 <percentage> 。值为 100% 完全是灰度，而值为 0% 则保持输入不变。 0% 到 100% 之间的值是效果的线性乘数。省略时的默认值为 1 。插值的初始值为 0 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of the conversion, specified as a <number> or a <percentage>. A value of 100% is completely grayscale, while a value of 0% leaves the input unchanged. Values between 0% and 100% are linear multipliers on the effect. The lacuna value for interpolation is 0.
trans-unit.target: 转换量，指定为 <number> 或 <percentage> 。值为 100% 完全是灰度，而值为 0% 则保持输入不变。 0% 到 100% 之间的值是效果的线性乘数。插值的空白值是 0 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of the conversion, specified as a <number> or a <percentage>. A value of 100% is completely inverted, while a value of 0% leaves the input unchanged. Values between 0% and 100% are linear multipliers on the effect. The lacuna value for interpolation is 0.

trans-unit.source: The amount of the conversion, specified as a <number> or a <percentage>. A value of 100% is completely sepia, while a value of 0% leaves the input unchanged. Values between 0% and 100% are linear multipliers on the effect. The lacuna value for interpolation is 0.

trans-unit.source: The amount of the conversion, specified as a <number> or a <percentage>. A value under 100% desaturates the image, while a value over 100% super-saturates it. A value of 0% is completely unsaturated, while a value of 100% leaves the input unchanged. The lacuna value for interpolation is 1.

trans-unit.source: The animation jumps immediately to its final state, where it stays until the end. This keyword represents the easing function steps(1, jump-start) or steps(1, start).
trans-unit.target: 动画立即跳到其最终状态，并保持到最后状态。此关键字表示缓动函数 steps(1, jump-start) 或 steps(1, start) 。

trans-unit.target: 动画立即跳到其最终状态，并保持到最后状态。该关键字表示计时功能 steps(1, start) 。

trans-unit.source: The animation moves from beginning to end at a constant rate. This keyword represents the easing function cubic-bezier(0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0).
trans-unit.target: 动画以恒定的速率从头到尾移动。此关键字表示缓动函数 cubic-bezier(0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0) 。

trans-unit.source: The animation moves from beginning to end at a constant rate. This keyword represents the timing function cubic-bezier(0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0).
trans-unit.target: 动画以恒定的速率从头到尾移动。此关键字表示计时函数 cubic-bezier(0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0) 。

trans-unit.source: The animation plays backwards each cycle. In other words, each time the animation cycles, the animation will reset to the end state and start over again. Animation steps are performed backwards, and timing functions are also reversed. For example, an ease-in timing function becomes ease-out.
trans-unit.target: 动画在每个周期后退。换句话说，每次动画循环时，动画将重置为结束状态并重新开始。动画步骤向后执行，计时功能也相反。例如， ease-in 定时功能变为 ease-out 。

trans-unit.source: The animation plays forwards each cycle. In other words, each time the animation cycles, the animation will reset to the beginning state and start over again. This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 动画在每个循环中向前播放。换句话说，每次动画循环时，动画将重置为开始状态并重新开始。这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: The animation reverses direction each cycle, with the first iteration being played backwards. The count to determinate if a cycle is even or odd starts at one.
trans-unit.target: 动画在每个循环中反转方向，第一次迭代向后播放。确定一个周期是偶数还是奇数的计数从一个开始。

trans-unit.source: The animation reverses direction each cycle, with the first iteration being played backwards. The count to determine if a cycle is even or odd starts at one.

trans-unit.source: The animation reverses direction each cycle, with the first iteration being played forwards. The count to determine if a cycle is even or odd starts at one.
trans-unit.target: 动画在每个循环中都反转方向，而第一个迭代则向前播放。确定一个周期是偶数还是奇数的计数从一个开始。

trans-unit.source: The animation starts abruptly, and then progressively slows down towards the end. This keyword represents the easing function cubic-bezier(0.0, 0.0, 0.58, 1.0).
trans-unit.target: 动画突然开始，然后逐渐变慢直到结束。这个关键字表示缓和功能 cubic-bezier( 0.0, 0.0, 0.58, 1.0 ) 。

trans-unit.source: The animation starts slowly, accelerates sharply, and then slows gradually towards the end. This keyword represents the easing function cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.1, 0.25, 1.0). It is similar to ease-in-out, though it accelerates more sharply at the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 动画开始缓慢，急剧加速，然后逐渐减速直至结束。此关键字表示缓动函数 cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.1, 0.25, 1.0) 。它与渐入 ease-in-out 相似，但在开始时会更快地加速。

trans-unit.source: The animation starts slowly, accelerates sharply, and then slows gradually towards the end. This keyword represents the timing function cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.1, 0.25, 1.0). It is similar to ease-in-out, though it accelerates more sharply at the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 动画开始缓慢，急剧加速，然后逐渐减速直至结束。此关键字表示计时函数 cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.1, 0.25, 1.0) 。它与渐入 ease-in-out 相似，尽管在开始时会更迅速地加速。

trans-unit.target: 动画开始缓慢，然后逐渐加速直到结束，然后动画突然停止。该关键字表示缓动函数 cubic-bezier(0.42, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0) 。

trans-unit.source: The animation starts slowly, speeds up, and then slows down towards the end. This keyword represents the easing function cubic-bezier(0.42, 0.0, 0.58, 1.0). At the beginning, it behaves like the ease-in function; at the end, it is like the ease-out function.
trans-unit.target: 动画开始缓慢，加速，然后减速直至结束。此关键字表示缓动函数 cubic-bezier(0.42, 0.0, 0.58, 1.0) 。刚开始时，它的行为类似于 ease-in 函数。最后，它就像 ease-out 功能。

trans-unit.source: The animations run well, even under moderate system load. Simple animations can often perform poorly in JavaScript (unless they’re well made). The rendering engine can use frame-skipping and other techniques to keep the performance as smooth as possible.

trans-unit.source: The application will look and feel like a standalone application. This can include the application having a different window, its own icon in the application launcher, etc. In this mode, the user agent will exclude UI elements for controlling navigation, but can include other UI elements such as a status bar.
trans-unit.target: 该应用程序的外观和感觉将像一个独立的应用程序。这可以包括应用程序有一个不同的窗口,在应用程序启动器中有自己的图标等。在这种模式下,用户代理将排除控制导航的UI元素,但可以包括其他UI元素,如状态栏。

trans-unit.source: The area that you create by chaining the area names must be rectangular, at this point there is no way to create an L-shaped area. The specification does note that a future level might provide this functionality. You can however span rows just as easily as columns. For example we could make our sidebar span down to the end of the footer by replacing the . with sd.
trans-unit.target: 通过链接区域名称创建的区域必须为矩形，此时无法创建L形区域。规范确实指出，将来的级别可能会提供此功能。但是，您可以像跨栏一样轻松地跨行。例如，我们可以通过替换来使侧边栏向下扩展到页脚的末尾 . 与 sd 。

trans-unit.source: The argument determines the distance over which the fade effect is applied. The <percentage> is resolved against the width of the line box. Values lower than 0 are clipped to 0. Values greater than the width of the line box are clipped to the width of the line box.

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <angle> dimension, that is including the unit (e.g. 30.5deg). If it is not valid, that is not an angle or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <frequency> dimension, that is including the unit (e.g. 30.5kHz). If it is not valid, that is not a frequency or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为CSS <frequency> 维度，其中包括单位（例如 30.5kHz ）。如果无效，则它不是频率或不在CSS属性接受的范围内，则使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <integer>. If it is not valid, that is not an integer or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为CSS <integer> 。如果无效，则它不是整数或超出CSS属性接受的范围，则使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <length> dimension, that is including the unit (e.g. 12.5em). If it is not valid, that is not a length or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <number>, that is without the unit (e.g. 12.5), and interpreted as a <frequency> with the specified unit. If it is not valid, that is not a number or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为CSS <number> ，即没有单位（例如 12.5 ），并被解释为具有指定单位的 <frequency> 。如果无效，则它不是数字或超出CSS属性接受的范围，将使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <number>, that is without the unit (e.g. 12.5), and interpreted as a <length> with the specified unit. If it is not valid, that is not a number or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为CSS <number> ，不包含单位（例如 12.5 ），并被解释为具有指定单位的 <length> 。如果无效，则它不是数字或超出CSS属性接受的范围，将使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <number>, that is without the unit (e.g. 12.5), and interpreted as an <angle> with the specified unit. If it is not valid, that is not a number or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <number>, that is without the unit (e.g. 12.5), and interpreted as an<time> with the specified unit. If it is not valid, that is not a number or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <number>. If it is not valid, that is not a number or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <time> dimension, that is including the unit (e.g. 30.5ms). If it is not valid, that is not a time or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a hash (3- or 6-value hash) or a keyword. It must be a valid CSS <string> value.

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is treated as a CSS <string>. It is NOT reparsed, and in particular the characters are used as-is instead of CSS escapes being turned into different characters.

trans-unit.source: The background is fixed relative to the element's contents. trans-unit.source: The basic difference between CSS Grid Layout and CSS Flexbox Layout is that flexbox was designed for layout in one dimension - either a row or a column. Grid was designed for two-dimensional layout - rows, and columns at the same time. The two specifications share some common features, however, and if you have already learned how to use flexbox, the similarities should help you get to grips with Grid.
trans-unit.target: CSS Grid Layout和CSS Flexbox Layout之间的基本区别在于flexbox是为在一个维度（行或列）中进行布局而设计的。网格被设计用于二维布局-同时行和列。这两个规范具有一些共同的功能，但是，如果您已经学习了如何使用flexbox，那么相似之处应该可以帮助您掌握Grid。

trans-unit.source: The best way to learn to use grid layout is to continue to build examples like the ones we have covered here. Pick something that you normally build using your framework of choice, or using floats, and see if you can build it using grid. Don’t forget to find examples that are impossible to build with current methods. That might mean taking inspiration from magazines or other non-web sources. Grid Layout opens up possibilities that we have not had before, we don’t need to be tied to the same old layouts to use it.
trans-unit.target: 学习使用网格布局的最佳方法是继续构建类似于我们在此介绍的示例。选择通常使用选择的框架或浮点数构建的对象，然后查看是否可以使用网格构建它。不要忘记找到用当前方法无法构建的示例。这可能意味着要从杂志或其他非网络资源中汲取灵感。网格布局为我们提供了前所未有的可能性，我们不需要绑定到相同的旧布局即可使用它。

trans-unit.target: 与边框相关的速记CSS属性： border ， border-width ， border-color ， border-radius

trans-unit.target: 与边框相关的速记属性： border ， border-style ， border-color

trans-unit.target: 与border-width相关的属性： border-bottom-width ， border-left-width ， border-right-width ， border-top-width

trans-unit.source: The borders in the other dimension can be set with border-block, which sets border-block-start, and border-block-end.

trans-unit.source: The borders in the other dimension can be set with border-inline, which sets border-inline-start, and border-inline-end.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 border-inline 设置另一个维度的边框，border-inline设置 border-inline-start 和 border-inline-end 。

trans-unit.target: 可以使用 border-inline 设置另一个维度的边界，border-inline设置 border-inline-start 和 border-inline-end 。

trans-unit.source: The bottom edge, specified as an <integer> or <percentage>, of the sub-image within the specified image.
trans-unit.target: 指定图像内子图像的底边，指定为 <integer> 或 <percentage> 。

trans-unit.source: The box alignment module
trans-unit.target: 箱体对齐模块

trans-unit.source: The box alignment specification also includes the gap, row-gap, and column-gap properties. These properties enable the setting of a consistent gap between items in a row or column, in any layout method which has items arranged in this way.
trans-unit.target: 框对齐规范还包括 gap ， row-gap 和 column-gap 属性。这些属性允许在以这种方式排列项目的任何布局方法中，在行或列中的项目之间设置一致的间隙。

trans-unit.source: The box does not define a snap position in that axis.
trans-unit.target: 框中没有定义该轴的卡位。

trans-unit.source: The box does not establish a new local stacking context. The stack level of the generated box in the current stacking context is the same as its parent's box.
trans-unit.target: 盒子不建立新的本地堆栈上下文。在当前堆栈上下文中,生成的盒子的堆栈级别与它的父盒子相同。

trans-unit.source: The box is a square: an arc of circle is used as the border
trans-unit.target: 盒子是一个正方形:用一个圆弧作为边框。

trans-unit.source: The box is not a square: an arc of ellipse is used as the border
trans-unit.target: 盒子不是一个正方形:用一个椭圆的弧形作为边框。

trans-unit.source: The box model
trans-unit.target: 盒子模型

trans-unit.source: The box model does not fully apply to items participating in an inline formatting context. In a horizontal writing mode line, horizontal padding, borders and margin will be applied to the element and push the text away left and right. However, margins above and below the element will not be applied. Vertical padding and borders will be applied but may overlap content above and below as, in the inline formatting context, the line boxes will not be pushed apart by padding and borders.
trans-unit.target: 框模式并不完全适用于参与内联格式化上下文的项目。在水平书写模式行中,水平填充、边框和边距将被应用于元素,并将文本向左和向右推开。但是,元素上方和下方的边距将不会被应用。垂直填充和边框将被应用,但可能会与上方和下方的内容重叠,因为在行内格式化上下文中,行框不会被填充和边框推开。

trans-unit.source: The box’s preferred aspect ratio is the specified ratio of width / height. Size calculations involving preferred aspect ratio work with the dimensions of the box specified by box-sizing.
trans-unit.target: 盒子的首选长宽比是指定的 width / height 比率。涉及首选宽高比的尺寸计算使用 box-sizing 指定的盒子尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The box's list of CSS classes is reset to simply "box". This has the effect of removing any other classes currently applied to the box, including the "changing" class that handles animation. In other words, we're removing the animation effect from the box. However, changes to the class list don't take effect until the style recomputation is complete and a refresh has occurred to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 框的CSS类列表重置为简单的 "box" 。这具有删除当前应用于该框的任何其他类的效果，包括处理动画的 "changing" 类。换句话说，我们正在从框中删除动画效果。但是，对类列表所做的更改只有在样式重新计算完成并且发生刷新以反映所做的更改后才会生效。

trans-unit.source: The boxes around the words before the <strong> element and after the <strong> element are referred to as anonymous boxes, boxes introduced to ensure that everything is wrapped in a box, but ones that we cannot target directly.
trans-unit.target: 围绕之前的话框 <strong> 元素后 <strong> 元素被称为匿名盒，推出以确保一切都被包裹在一个盒子箱子，但那些我们不能直接目标。

trans-unit.source: The boxes around the words before the strong element and after the strong element are referred to as anonymous boxes, boxes introduced to ensure that everything is wrapped in a box, but ones that we cannot target directly.
trans-unit.target: 强势元素之前和强势元素之后的词语周围的盒子被称为匿名盒子,这些盒子的引入是为了确保所有的东西都被包裹在一个盒子里,但这些盒子是我们无法直接针对的。

trans-unit.source: The brightness of the result, specified as a <number> or a <percentage>. A value under 100% darkens the image, while a value over 100% brightens it. A value of 0% will create an image that is completely black, while a value of 100% leaves the input unchanged. The lacuna value for interpolation is 1.
trans-unit.target: 结果的亮度，指定为 <number> 或 <percentage> 。小于 100% 的值会使图像变暗，而大于 100% 的值会使图像变亮。值为 0% 将创建全黑图像，而值为 100% 则使输入保持不变。插值的空白值是 1 。

trans-unit.source: The browser must interrupt underlines and overlines so that they do not touch or closely approach a glyph. This can be helpful with certain Chinese, Japanese, or Korean (CJK) fonts, where the auto behavior might not create interruptions.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器必须中断下划线和上划线，以使它们不会接触或紧密接近字形。这对于某些中文，日文或韩文（CJK）字体可能会有所帮助，在这些字体中， auto 行为可能不会造成中断。

trans-unit.source: The browser chooses an appropriate width for the text decoration line.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器为文字装饰线选择一个合适的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The browser chooses the appropriate offset for underlines.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器为下划线选择适当的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The browser chooses the best type of justification for the current situation based on a balance between performance and quality, but also on what is most appropriate for the language of the text (e.g., English, CJK languages, etc.). This is the default justification used if text-justify is not set at all.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器会根据性能和质量之间的平衡，并根据最适合文本语言（例如英语，CJK语言等）的情况，为当前情况选择最佳的证明类型。如果根本未设置 text-justify ,则这是默认的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The browser determines whether font kerning should be used or not. For example, some browsers will disable kerning on small fonts, since applying it could harm the readability of text.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器决定是否应该使用字库。例如,有些浏览器会禁用小字体的角化,因为使用角化会损害文本的可读性。

trans-unit.source: The browser emphasizes geometric precision over rendering speed and legibility. Certain aspects of fonts — such as kerning — don't scale linearly. So this value can make text using those fonts look good.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器强调几何精度，而不是渲染速度和可读性。字体的某些方面（例如字距调整）不会线性缩放。因此，此值可使使用这些字体的文本看起来不错。

trans-unit.source: The browser emphasizes legibility over rendering speed and geometric precision. This enables kerning and optional ligatures.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器强调可读性而非渲染速度和几何精度。这使得内核和可选的连接成为可能。

trans-unit.source: The browser emphasizes rendering speed over legibility and geometric precision when drawing text. It disables kerning and ligatures.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器在绘制文本时,强调渲染速度而非可读性和几何精度。它禁用了内核和连接符。

trans-unit.source: The browser has a basic style sheet that gives a default style to any document. These style sheets are named user-agent stylesheets. Some browsers use actual style sheets for this purpose, while others simulate them in code, but the end result is the same.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器具有基本样式表，该样式表为任何文档提供默认样式。这些样式表称为用户代理样式表。一些浏览器为此目的使用了实际的样式表，而另一些浏览器则在代码中对其进行了模拟，但是最终结果是相同的。

trans-unit.source: The browser is free to automatically break words at appropriate hyphenation points, following whatever rules it chooses to use. However, suggested line break opportunities (see Suggesting line break opportunities below) will override automatic break point selection when present.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器可以根据选择使用的任何规则，自由地在适当的连字点自动中断单词。但是，建议的换行机会（请参见下面的建议换行机会）将覆盖自动断点的选择（如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: The browser is free to automatically break words at appropriate hyphenation points, following whatever rules it chooses. However, suggested line break opportunities (see Suggesting line break opportunities below) will override automatic break point selection when present.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器可以根据选择的规则自由地在适当的连字点自动断词。但是，建议的换行机会（请参见下面的“建议换行机会”）将覆盖自动断点的选择（如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: The browser makes educated guesses about when to optimize for speed, legibility, and geometric precision while drawing text. For differences in how this value is interpreted by the browser, see the compatibility table.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器会有根据地猜测何时在绘制文本时对速度、可读性和几何精度进行优化。关于浏览器对该值的解释差异,请参阅兼容性表。

trans-unit.source: The browser makes trade-offs among speed, legibility, and geometric precision.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器在速度、可读性和几何精度之间做出权衡。

trans-unit.source: The browser selects a suitable margin to use. For example, in certain cases this value can be used to center an element.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器选择一个合适的边距来使用。例如,在某些情况下,该值可用于将元素居中。

trans-unit.source: The browser selects a suitable value to use. See margin.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器选择一个合适的值来使用。参见 margin 。

trans-unit.source: The browser will calculate and select a max-width for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器将计算并选择指定元素的 max-width 。

trans-unit.source: The browser will calculate and select a min-height for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器将计算并选择指定元素的 min-height 。

trans-unit.source: The browser will calculate and select a min-width for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器将计算并选择指定元素的 min-width 。

trans-unit.source: The browser will calculate and select a height for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器将计算并选择指定元素的高度。

trans-unit.source: The browser will calculate and select a width for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器将计算并选择指定元素的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The browser will modify the shape of glyphs for optimal viewing.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器将修改字形的形状,以达到最佳观赏效果。

trans-unit.source: The browser will not modify the shape of glyphs for optimal viewing.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器不会修改字形的形状,以达到最佳观赏效果。

trans-unit.source: The browser's default spacing is used between columns. For multi-column layout this is specified as 1em. For all other layout types it is 0.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器的默认间距用于各列之间。对于多列布局，将其指定为 1em 。对于所有其他布局类型，该值为0。

trans-unit.source: The browser-defined size matching the usual cursor size on the client's system
trans-unit.target: 浏览器定义的大小,与客户端系统中通常的光标大小相匹配。

trans-unit.source: The callout is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 召之即来挥之即去。

trans-unit.source: The caption box should be positioned above the table, while the width and horizontal alignment behavior are not bound to the table's horizontal layout.
trans-unit.target: 标题框的位置应在表格上方,而宽度和水平对齐行为不受表格水平布局的约束。

trans-unit.source: The caption box should be positioned above the table.
trans-unit.target: 标题框的位置应在表格上方。

trans-unit.source: The caption box should be positioned below the table, while the width and horizontal alignment behavior are not bound to the table's horizontal layout.
trans-unit.target: 标题框的位置应该在表格的下方,而宽度和水平对齐行为不受表格水平布局的约束。

trans-unit.source: The card is going to be our flex container, with flex-direction set to column. I then give the date an order of -1. This pulls it up above the heading.
trans-unit.target: 该卡将成为我们的伸缩容器， flex-direction 设置为column。然后我给的日期的 order 的 -1 。这将其拉到标题上方。

trans-unit.source: The cascading algorithm determines how to find the value to apply for each property for each document element.
trans-unit.target: 级联算法决定了如何为每个文档元素找到适用于每个属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The center alignment of this box's scroll snap area, within the scroll container's snapport is a snap position in this axis.
trans-unit.target: 这个框的滚动卡位区域的中心对齐,在滚动容器的卡位内就是这个轴的一个卡位。

trans-unit.source: The child elements are styled as follows:
trans-unit.target: 子元素的样式如下。

trans-unit.source: The child elements of this container will now lay out item by item along the rows, as they would with regular grid layout autoplacement. However, as they move onto a new row the items will display according the the masonry algorithm. Items will load into the column with the most room causing a tightly packed layout without strict row tracks.
trans-unit.target: 这个容器的子元素现在将沿着行逐项排列,就像常规网格布局自动放置一样。然而,当它们移动到新的行时,项目将按照砖石算法显示。项目将加载到空间最大的那一列,造成紧凑的布局,而没有严格的行轨。

trans-unit.source: The child will influence the stack's size.
trans-unit.target: 孩子将影响堆栈的大小。

trans-unit.source: The classical CSS concept of validity, tied to each property, is not very useful in regard to custom properties. When the values of the custom properties are parsed, the browser doesn't know where they will be used, so must, therefore, consider nearly all values as valid.
trans-unit.target: 与每个属性相关联的经典CSS有效性概念对于自定义属性不是很有用。解析自定义属性的值时，浏览器不知道将在何处使用它们，因此必须将几乎所有值都视为有效。

trans-unit.source: The color applies to decorations, such as underlines, overlines, strikethroughs, and wavy lines like those used to mark misspellings, in the scope of the property's value.
trans-unit.target: 该颜色适用于属性值范围内的装饰,如下划线、横线、删除线和波浪线,如用于标记错别字的装饰。

trans-unit.source: The color green is commonly used to indicate valid input. People who have certain types of color blindness will be unable to determine the input's state unless it is accompanied by an additional indicator that does not rely on color to convey meaning. Typically, descriptive text and/or an icon are used.
trans-unit.target: 绿色通常用来表示有效的输入。有某些类型的色盲症的人将无法确定输入的状态,除非它伴随着一个额外的指示器,而不是依靠颜色来表达意义。通常情况下,会使用描述性文字和/或图标。

trans-unit.source: The color keywords all represent plain, solid colors, without transparency.
trans-unit.target: 颜色关键词都代表纯色、纯色,没有透明度。

trans-unit.source: The color of the border away from the light source for 3-D elements that appear 3-D due to that layer of surrounding border.
trans-unit.target: 由于周围那层边框而出现三维元素的远离光源的边框的颜色。

trans-unit.target: 面向光源的三维元素的边框的颜色,由于该层周围的边框而显得三维。

trans-unit.target: fill 和 stroke 属性的颜色部分

trans-unit.source: The color red is commonly used to indicate invalid input. People who have certain types of color blindness will be unable to determine the input's state unless it is accompanied by an additional indicator that does not rely on color to convey meaning. Typically, descriptive text and/or an icon are used.
trans-unit.target: 红色通常用来表示无效的输入。有某些类型的色盲症的人将无法确定输入的状态,除非它伴随着一个额外的指示器,而不是依靠颜色来表达意义。通常情况下,会使用描述性文字和/或图标。

trans-unit.source: The color-hint is an interpolation hint defining how the gradient progresses between adjacent color stops. The length defines at which point between two color stops the gradient color should reach the midpoint of the color transition. If omitted, the midpoint of the color transition is the midpoint between two color stops.
trans-unit.target: color-hint是一个插值提示,定义了相邻颜色停止点之间的渐变进度。长度定义了在两个色阶之间的哪个点上,渐变颜色应该达到颜色转换的中点。如果省略,颜色转换的中点就是两个颜色停止点之间的中点。

trans-unit.source: The color-related CSS properties for the other borders: border-left-color, border-bottom-color, and border-top-color.
trans-unit.target: 其他边框的颜色相关CSS属性： border-left-color ， border-bottom-color 和 border-top-color 。

trans-unit.source: The color-related CSS properties for the other borders: border-right-color, border-bottom-color, and border-left-color.

trans-unit.source: The conic-gradient syntax is similar to the radial-gradient syntax, but the color-stops are placed around a gradient arc, the circumference of a circle, rather than on the gradient line emerging from the center of the gradient, and the color-stops are percentages or degrees: absolute lengths are not valid.
trans-unit.target: 圆锥梯度语法与径向梯度语法类似,但色标是围绕梯度弧线,即圆的周长,而不是在梯度中心出现的梯度线上,而且色标是百分比或度数:绝对长度无效。

trans-unit.source: The conic-gradient syntax is similar to the radial-gradient syntax, but the color-stops are placed around a gradient arc, the circumference of a circle, rather than on the gradient line emerging from the center of the gradient. With conic gradients, the colors transition as as if spun around the center of a circle, starting at the top and going clockwise. In a radial gradient, the colors transition from the center of an ellipse, outward, in all directions.
trans-unit.target: 圆锥梯度语法与径向梯度语法相似,但颜色停顿是围绕着一个梯度弧,即圆的圆周,而不是围绕着从梯度中心出现的梯度线。在圆锥渐变中,颜色的转换就像围绕着圆心旋转一样,从顶部开始,顺时针方向。在径向渐变中,颜色从椭圆的中心向外,向各个方向过渡。

trans-unit.source: The content goes into the box. Once it fills the box, it continues to overflow in a visible way, displaying content outside the box, potentially displaying under subsequent content. The property that controls how overflow behaves is the overflow property which has an initial value of visible. This is why we can see the overflow content.
trans-unit.target: 内容进入包装盒。填充框后，它将继续以可见的方式溢出，在框外显示内容，并可能在后续内容下显示。控制溢出行为的属性是具有初始值 visible 的 overflow 属性。这就是为什么我们可以看到溢出内容的原因。

trans-unit.source: The content is sized as if none or contain were specified, whichever would result in a smaller concrete object size.
trans-unit.target: 内容的大小就像未指定 none 或 contain 任何内容一样，以较小的具体对象大小为准。

trans-unit.source: The content moves exactly with the user's finger. This value allows for free-form panning.

trans-unit.source: The content of the element shall be selected atomically: If a selection would contain part of the element, then the selection must contain the entire element including all its descendants. If a double-click or context-click occurred in sub-elements, the highest ancestor with this value will be selected.
trans-unit.target: 元素的内容应以原子方式选择。如果一个选择将包含元素的一部分,那么选择必须包含整个元素,包括其所有的子元素。如果在子元素中发生了双击或上下文点击,将选择具有该值的最高祖先。

trans-unit.target: 结果的对比度，指定为 <number> 或 <percentage> 。低于 100% 的值会降低对比度，而高于 100% 的值会提高对比度。值为 0% 将创建完全灰色的图像，而值为 100% 则使输入保持不变。插值的空白值是 1 。

trans-unit.source: The display type of an element defines the outer display type, this dictates how the box displays alongside other elements in the same formatting context. It also defines the inner display type, which dictates how boxes inside this element behave. We can see this very clearly when considering a flex layout. In the example below I have a div, which I have given display: flex. The flex container behaves like a block element, it displays on a new line and takes up all of the space it can in the inline direction. This is the outer display type of block.
trans-unit.target: 元素的显示类型定义了外部显示类型，这决定了框在相同格式上下文中如何与其他元素一起显示。它还定义了内部显示类型，该类型指示该元素内部的框的行为。在考虑弹性布局时，我们可以很清楚地看到这一点。在下面的示例中，我有一个div，其 display: flex 。flex容器的行为就像一个块元素，它显示在新行上并占据其在行内方向上可以使用的所有空间。这是 block 的外部显示类型。

trans-unit.source: The display type of an element defines the outer display type; this dictates how the box displays alongside other elements in the same formatting context. It also defines the inner display type, which dictates how boxes inside this element behave. We can see this very clearly when considering a flex layout. In the example below I have a <div>, which I have given display: flex. The flex container behaves like a block element: it displays on a new line and takes up all of the space it can in the inline direction. This is the outer display type of block.
trans-unit.target: 元素的显示类型定义外部显示类型；元素的显示类型定义外部显示类型。这决定了框在相同格式上下文中如何与其他元素一起显示。它还定义了内部显示类型，该类型指示该元素内的框的行为方式。在考虑弹性布局时，我们可以很清楚地看到这一点。在下面的示例中，我有一个 <div> ，其 display: flex 。 flex容器的行为就像一个块元素：在新行上显示并占据其在行内方向上的所有空间。这是 block 的外部显示类型。

trans-unit.source: The document element's Element.clientWidth is the inner width of an document in CSS pixels, including padding (but not borders, margins, or vertical scrollbars, if present). This is the viewport width. The Window.innerWidth is the width, in CSS pixels, of the browser window viewport including, if rendered, the vertical scrollbar. The Window.outerWidth is the width of the outside of the browser window including all the window chrome.
trans-unit.target: 文档元素的 Element.clientWidth 是文档的内部宽度，以CSS像素为单位，包括填充（但不包括边框，边距或垂直滚动​​条，如果存在的话）。这是视口宽度。该 Window.innerWidth 是宽度，以CSS像素，浏览器窗口视口包括，如果渲染，垂直滚动条。该 Window.outerWidth 是浏览器窗口包括所有的窗口镶边的外侧的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The document should be locked into landscape orientation.

trans-unit.source: The document should be locked into portrait orientation.
trans-unit.target: 文件应锁定为纵向。

trans-unit.source: The duration that an animation takes to complete one cycle. This may be specified in either seconds (s) or milliseconds (ms). The value must positive or zero and the unit is required. A value of 0s, which is the default value, indicates that no animation should occur.
trans-unit.target: 动画完成一个周期所需的时间。可以以秒（ s ）或毫秒（ ms ）来指定。该值必须为正数或零，并且必须为单位。的值 0s ，这是缺省值，表示没有动画应该发生。

trans-unit.source: The easing functions in the cubic-bezier subset of easing functions are often called "smooth" easing functions, because they can be used to smooth down the start and end of the animation. They correlate a time ratio to an output ratio, both expressed as <number>s. For these values, 0.0 represents the initial state, and 1.0 represents the final state.
trans-unit.target: 缓动函数的三次方贝塞尔曲线子集中的缓动函数通常称为“平滑”缓动函数，因为它们可用于平滑动画的开始和结束。它们将时间比率与输出比率相关联，两者均表示为 <number> s。对于这些值， 0.0 表示初始状态，而 1.0 表示最终状态。

trans-unit.source: The element is initially rendered as if its box were not fragmented, after which the rendering for this hypothetical box is sliced into pieces for each line/column/page. Note that the hypothetical box can be different for each fragment since it uses its own height if the break occurs in the inline direction, and its own width if the break occurs in the block direction. See the CSS specification for details.
trans-unit.target: 元素最初被渲染为其框体没有被碎片化,之后,这个假设的框体的渲染被切成每行/每列/每页的碎片。请注意,每个片段的假设框可以是不同的,因为如果断裂发生在内联方向,它使用自己的高度,如果断裂发生在块方向,它使用自己的宽度。详见CSS规范。

trans-unit.source: The element is never the target of pointer events; however, pointer events may target its descendant elements if those descendants have pointer-events set to some other value. trans-unit.target: 元素永远不会是指针事件的目标；但是，如果 pointer-events 后代的指针事件设置为其他值，则指针事件可以将其后代元素作为目标。在这些情况下，指针事件将在事件捕获/冒泡阶段期间按适当的方式触发此父元素上的事件侦听器，以使其进入/离开后代。

trans-unit.source: The element is never the target of mouse events; however, mouse events may target its descendant elements if those descendants have pointer-events set to some other value. trans-unit.target: 元素永远不是鼠标事件的目标；但是，如果鼠标后代的 pointer-events 设置为其他值，则鼠标事件可能会针对其后代元素。在这些情况下，鼠标事件将在事件捕获/ 冒泡阶段期间按适当的方式触发此父元素上的事件监听器。

trans-unit.source: The element is removed from the normal document flow, and no space is created for the element in the page layout. Its final position is determined by the values of top, right, bottom, and left.

trans-unit.source: The element is removed from the normal document flow, and no space is created for the element in the page layout. trans-unit.source: The element is removed from the normal document flow, and no space is created for the element in the page layout. It is positioned relative to the initial containing block established by the viewport, except when one of its ancestors has a transform, perspective, or filter property set to something other than none (see the CSS Transforms Spec), in which case that ancestor behaves as the containing block. (Note that there are browser inconsistencies with perspective and filter contributing to containing block formation.) Its final position is determined by the values of top, right, bottom, and left.

trans-unit.source: The element is rotated similar to auto, except it faces the opposite direction. It is the same as specifying a value of auto 180deg.
trans-unit.target: 元素的旋转方式类似于 auto ，但其方向相反。与指定 auto 180deg 的值相同。

trans-unit.source: The element is styled as a button that would indicate a menulist can be opened.
trans-unit.target: 该元素被设计成一个按钮,表示可以打开一个menulist。

trans-unit.source: The element is styled as the text field for a menulist. (Not implemented for the Windows platform)
trans-unit.target: 该元素的样式为menulist的文本字段。(在Windows平台上没有实现)

trans-unit.source: The element is styled like a progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 该元素的风格像一个进度条。

trans-unit.source: The element is styled like a progress bar. Use progress-bar instead
trans-unit.target: 元素的样式类似于进度条。使用 progress-bar 代替

trans-unit.source: The element is translucent (that is, content behind the element can be seen).
trans-unit.target: 该元素是半透明的(即可以看到元素后面的内容)。

trans-unit.source: The element lays out its contents using flow layout (block-and-inline layout).
trans-unit.target: 元素使用流式布局(块状和线状布局)来布置其内容。

trans-unit.source: The element looks like this when inserted into the page:
trans-unit.target: 当插入到页面中时,该元素看起来像这样。

trans-unit.source: The element must float on the end side of its containing block. That is the right side with ltr scripts, and the left side with rtl scripts.
trans-unit.target: 元素必须在其包含块的末端浮动。这是使用 ltr 脚本的右侧，而使用 rtl 脚本的左侧。

trans-unit.source: The element must float on the end side of its containing block. That is the right side with ltr scripts, and the left side with rtl scripts.
trans-unit.target: 元素必须浮动在其包含的块的末端。这对于ltr脚本来说是右侧,对于rtl脚本来说是左侧。

trans-unit.source: The element must float on the left side of its containing block.
trans-unit.target: 该元素必须浮动在其包含块的左侧。

trans-unit.source: The element must float on the right side of its containing block.
trans-unit.target: 该元素必须浮动在其包含块的右侧。

trans-unit.source: The element must float on the start side of its containing block. That is the left side with ltr scripts, and the right side with rtl scripts.
trans-unit.target: 元素必须在其包含块的开始侧浮动。左侧是 ltr 脚本，右侧是 rtl 脚本。

trans-unit.source: The element must float on the start side of its containing block. That is the left side with ltr scripts, and the right side with rtl scripts.
trans-unit.target: 元素必须浮动在其包含块的起始边。这对于ltr脚本来说是左边,对于rtl脚本来说是右边。

trans-unit.source: The element must not float.
trans-unit.target: 该元素不能浮动。
